     157           0 : static int co64_required(const MOVTrack *track)
     158             : {
     159           0 :     if (track->entry > 0 && track->cluster[track->entry - 1].pos + track->data_offset > UINT32_MAX)
     160           0 :         return 1;
     161             :     return 0;
     162             : }

     164           0 : static int is_cover_image(const AVStream *st)
     165             : {
     166             :     /* Eg. AV_DISPOSITION_ATTACHED_PIC | AV_DISPOSITION_TIMED_THUMBNAILS
     167             :      * is encoded as sparse video track */
     168           0 :     return st && st->disposition == AV_DISPOSITION_ATTACHED_PIC;

     171           0 : static int rtp_hinting_needed(const AVStream *st)
     172             : {
     173             :     /* Add hint tracks for each real audio and video stream */
     174           0 :     if (is_cover_image(st))
     175             :         return 0;
     176           0 :     return st->codecpar->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO ||
     177             :            st->codecpar->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO;

     180             : /* Chunk offset atom */
     181           0 : static int mov_write_stco_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     182             : {
     183           0 :     int i;
     184           0 :     int mode64 = co64_required(track); // use 32 bit size variant if possible
     185           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     186           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
     187           0 :     if (mode64)
     188           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "co64");
     189             :     else
     190           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "stco");
     191           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* version & flags */
     192           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->chunkCount); /* entry count */
     193           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     194           0 :         if (!track->cluster[i].chunkNum)
     195           0 :             continue;
     196           0 :         if (mode64 == 1)
     197           0 :             avio_wb64(pb, track->cluster[i].pos + track->data_offset);
     198             :         else
     199           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, track->cluster[i].pos + track->data_offset);
     200             :     }
     201           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     202             : }
     203             : 
     204             : /* Sample size atom */
     205           0 : static int mov_write_stsz_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     206             : {
     207           0 :     int equalChunks = 1;
     208           0 :     int i, j, entries = 0, tst = -1, oldtst = -1;
     209             : 
     210           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     211           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
     212           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "stsz");
     213           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* version & flags */
     214             : 
     215           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     216           0 :         tst = track->cluster[i].size / track->cluster[i].entries;
     217           0 :         if (oldtst != -1 && tst != oldtst)
     218           0 :             equalChunks = 0;
     219           0 :         oldtst = tst;
     220           0 :         entries += track->cluster[i].entries;
     221             :     }
     222           0 :     if (equalChunks && track->entry) {
     223           0 :         int sSize = track->entry ? track->cluster[0].size / track->cluster[0].entries : 0;
     224           0 :         sSize = FFMAX(1, sSize); // adpcm mono case could make sSize == 0
     225           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, sSize); // sample size
     226           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, entries); // sample count
     227             :     } else {
     228           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 0); // sample size
     229           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, entries); // sample count
     230           0 :         for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     231           0 :             for (j = 0; j < track->cluster[i].entries; j++) {
     232           0 :                 avio_wb32(pb, track->cluster[i].size /
     233             :                           track->cluster[i].entries);
     234             :             }
     235             :         }
     236             :     }
     237           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     238             : }
     239             : 
     240             : /* Sample to chunk atom */
     241           0 : static int mov_write_stsc_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     242             : {
     243           0 :     int index = 0, oldval = -1, i;
     244           0 :     int64_t entryPos, curpos;
     245             : 
     246           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     247           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
     248           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "stsc");
     249           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // version & flags
     250           0 :     entryPos = avio_tell(pb);
     251           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->chunkCount); // entry count
     252           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     253           0 :         if (oldval != track->cluster[i].samples_in_chunk && track->cluster[i].chunkNum) {
     254           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, track->cluster[i].chunkNum); // first chunk
     255           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, track->cluster[i].samples_in_chunk); // samples per chunk
     256           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, 0x1); // sample description index
     257           0 :             oldval = track->cluster[i].samples_in_chunk;
     258           0 :             index++;
     259             :         }
     260             :     }
     261           0 :     curpos = avio_tell(pb);
     262           0 :     avio_seek(pb, entryPos, SEEK_SET);
     263           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, index); // rewrite size
     264           0 :     avio_seek(pb, curpos, SEEK_SET);
     265             : 
     266           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     267             : }
     268             : 
     269             : /* Sync sample atom */
     270           0 : static int mov_write_stss_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track, uint32_t flag)
     271             : {
     272           0 :     int64_t curpos, entryPos;
     273           0 :     int i, index = 0;
     274           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     275           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // size
     276           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, flag == MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE ? "stss" : "stps");
     277           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // version & flags
     278           0 :     entryPos = avio_tell(pb);
     279           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->entry); // entry count
     280           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     281           0 :         if (track->cluster[i].flags & flag) {
     282           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, i + 1);
     283           0 :             index++;
     284             :         }
     285             :     }
     286           0 :     curpos = avio_tell(pb);
     287           0 :     avio_seek(pb, entryPos, SEEK_SET);
     288           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, index); // rewrite size
     289           0 :     avio_seek(pb, curpos, SEEK_SET);
     290           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     291             : }
     292             : 
     293             : /* Sample dependency atom */
     294           0 : static int mov_write_sdtp_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     295             : {
     296           0 :     int i;
     297           0 :     uint8_t leading, dependent, reference, redundancy;
     298           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     299           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // size
     300           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "sdtp");
     301           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // version & flags
     302           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
     303           0 :         dependent = MOV_SAMPLE_DEPENDENCY_YES;
     304           0 :         leading = reference = redundancy = MOV_SAMPLE_DEPENDENCY_UNKNOWN;
     305           0 :         if (track->cluster[i].flags & MOV_DISPOSABLE_SAMPLE) {
     306           0 :             reference = MOV_SAMPLE_DEPENDENCY_NO;
     307             :         }
     308           0 :         if (track->cluster[i].flags & MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE) {
     309           0 :             dependent = MOV_SAMPLE_DEPENDENCY_NO;
     310             :         }
     311           0 :         avio_w8(pb, (leading << 6)   | (dependent << 4) |
     312           0 :                     (reference << 2) | redundancy);
     313             :     }
     314           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     315             : }
     316             : 
     317           0 : static int mov_write_amr_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     318             : {
     319           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x11); /* size */
     320           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_MOV) ffio_wfourcc(pb, "samr");
     321           0 :     else                         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "damr");

     331             : struct eac3_info {
     332             :     AVPacket *pkt;
     333             :     uint8_t ec3_done;
     334             :     uint8_t num_blocks;
     335             : 
     336             :     /* Layout of the EC3SpecificBox */
     337             :     /* maximum bitrate */
     338             :     uint16_t data_rate;
     339             :     int8_t   ac3_bit_rate_code;
     340             :     /* number of independent substreams */
     341             :     uint8_t  num_ind_sub;
     342             :     struct {
     343             :         /* sample rate code (see ff_ac3_sample_rate_tab) 2 bits */
     344             :         uint8_t fscod;
     345             :         /* bit stream identification 5 bits */
     346             :         uint8_t bsid;
     347             :         /* one bit reserved */
     348             :         /* audio service mixing (not supported yet) 1 bit */
     349             :         /* bit stream mode 3 bits */
     350             :         uint8_t bsmod;
     351             :         /* audio coding mode 3 bits */
     352             :         uint8_t acmod;
     353             :         /* sub woofer on 1 bit */
     354             :         uint8_t lfeon;
     355             :         /* 3 bits reserved */
     356             :         /* number of dependent substreams associated with this substream 4 bits */
     357             :         uint8_t num_dep_sub;
     358             :         /* channel locations of the dependent substream(s), if any, 9 bits */
     359             :         uint16_t chan_loc;
     360             :         /* if there is no dependent substream, then one bit reserved instead */
     361             :     } substream[1]; /* TODO: support 8 independent substreams */
     362             : };
     363             : 
     364           0 : static int mov_write_ac3_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     365             : {
     366           0 :     struct eac3_info *info = track->eac3_priv;
     367           0 :     PutBitContext pbc;
     368           0 :     uint8_t buf[3];
     369             : 
     370           0 :     if (!info || !info->ec3_done) {
     371           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,
     372             :                "Cannot write moov atom before AC3 packets."
     373             :                " Set the delay_moov flag to fix this.\n");
     374           0 :         return AVERROR(EINVAL);
     375             :     }
     376             : 
     377           0 :     if (info->substream[0].bsid > 8) {
     378           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,

     383             :     }
     384             : 
     385           0 :     if (info->ac3_bit_rate_code < 0) {
     386           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,
     387             :                "No valid AC3 bit rate code for data rate of %d!\n",
     388           0 :                info->data_rate);
     389           0 :         return AVERROR(EINVAL);
     390             :     }

     396           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 2, info->substream[0].fscod);

     398           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 3, info->substream[0].bsmod);
     399           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 3, info->substream[0].acmod);

     410           0 : static int handle_eac3(MOVMuxContext *mov, AVPacket *pkt, MOVTrack *track)
     411             : {
     412           0 :     AC3HeaderInfo *hdr = NULL;
     413           0 :     struct eac3_info *info;
     414           0 :     int num_blocks, ret;
     415             : 
     416           0 :     if (!track->eac3_priv) {
     417           0 :         if (!(track->eac3_priv = av_mallocz(sizeof(*info))))
     418             :             return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
     419             : 
     420           0 :         ((struct eac3_info *)track->eac3_priv)->ac3_bit_rate_code = -1;
     421             :     }
     422           0 :     info = track->eac3_priv;
     423             : 
     424           0 :     if (!info->pkt && !(info->pkt = av_packet_alloc()))
     425             :         return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
     426             : 
     427           0 :     if ((ret = avpriv_ac3_parse_header(&hdr, pkt->data, pkt->size)) < 0) {
     428           0 :         if (ret == AVERROR(ENOMEM))
     429           0 :             goto end;
     430             : 
     431             :         /* drop the packets until we see a good one */
     432           0 :         if (!track->entry) {
     433           0 :             av_log(mov->fc, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Dropping invalid packet from start of the stream\n");
     434           0 :             ret = 0;
     435             :         } else
     436             :             ret = AVERROR_INVALIDDATA;
     437           0 :         goto end;
     438             :     }
     439             : 
     440           0 :     info->data_rate = FFMAX(info->data_rate, hdr->bit_rate / 1000);
     441           0 :     info->ac3_bit_rate_code = FFMAX(info->ac3_bit_rate_code,
     442             :                                     hdr->ac3_bit_rate_code);
     443           0 :     num_blocks = hdr->num_blocks;
     444             : 
     445           0 :     if (!info->ec3_done) {
     446             :         /* AC-3 substream must be the first one */
     447           0 :         if (hdr->bitstream_id <= 10 && hdr->substreamid != 0) {
     448           0 :             ret = AVERROR(EINVAL);
     449           0 :             goto end;
     450             :         }
     451             : 
     452             :         /* this should always be the case, given that our AC-3 parser
     453             :          * concatenates dependent frames to their independent parent */

     455             :             hdr->frame_type == EAC3_FRAME_TYPE_AC3_CONVERT) {
     456             :             /* substream ids must be incremental */
     457           0 :             if (hdr->substreamid > info->num_ind_sub + 1) {
     458           0 :                 ret = AVERROR(EINVAL);
     459           0 :                 goto end;

     466           0 :                 goto end;

     469           0 :                 info->ec3_done = 1;
     470           0 :                 goto concatenate;
     471             :             }
     472             :         } else {
     473           0 :             if (hdr->substreamid != 0) {
     474           0 :                 avpriv_request_sample(mov->fc, "Multiple non EAC3 independent substreams");
     475           0 :                 ret = AVERROR_PATCHWELCOME;
     476           0 :                 goto end;
     477             :             }
     478             :         }
     479             : 
     480             :         /* fill the info needed for the "dec3" atom */

     483           0 :         info->substream[hdr->substreamid].bsmod = hdr->bitstream_mode;
     484           0 :         info->substream[hdr->substreamid].acmod = hdr->channel_mode;
     485           0 :         info->substream[hdr->substreamid].lfeon = hdr->lfe_on;
     486             : 
     487           0 :         if (track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_AC3) {
     488             :             // with AC-3 we only require the information of a single packet,
     489             :             // so we can finish as soon as the basic values of the bit stream
     490             :             // have been set to the track's informational structure.
     491           0 :             info->ec3_done = 1;
     492           0 :             goto concatenate;
     493             :         }
     494             : 
     495             :         /* Parse dependent substream(s), if any */
     496           0 :         if (pkt->size != hdr->frame_size) {

     500           0 :             while (cumul_size != pkt->size) {

     502           0 :                 int i;

     505           0 :                     goto end;
     506           0 :                 if (hdr->frame_type != EAC3_FRAME_TYPE_DEPENDENT) {
     507           0 :                     ret = AVERROR(EINVAL);
     508           0 :                     goto end;
     509             :                 }
     510           0 :                 info->substream[parent].num_dep_sub++;

     512             : 
     513             :                 /* header is parsed up to lfeon, but custom channel map may be needed */

     516           0 :                 skip_bits(&gbc, 5);
     517             :                 /* skip volume control params */
     518           0 :                 for (i = 0; i < (hdr->channel_mode ? 1 : 2); i++) {
     519           0 :                     skip_bits(&gbc, 5); // skip dialog normalization
     520           0 :                     if (get_bits1(&gbc)) {
     521           0 :                         skip_bits(&gbc, 8); // skip compression gain word
     522             :                     }
     523             :                 }
     524             :                 /* get the dependent stream channel map, if exists */
     525           0 :                 if (get_bits1(&gbc))
     526           0 :                     info->substream[parent].chan_loc |= (get_bits(&gbc, 16) >> 5) & 0x1f;

     529           0 :                 cumul_size += hdr->frame_size;
     530             :             }

     532             :     }
     533             : 
     534           0 : concatenate:
     535           0 :     if (!info->num_blocks && num_blocks == 6) {
     536           0 :         ret = pkt->size;
     537           0 :         goto end;
     538             :     }
     539           0 :     else if (info->num_blocks + num_blocks > 6) {
     540           0 :         ret = AVERROR_INVALIDDATA;
     541           0 :         goto end;
     542             :     }
     543             : 
     544           0 :     if (!info->num_blocks) {
     545           0 :         ret = av_packet_ref(info->pkt, pkt);
     546           0 :         if (!ret)
     547           0 :             info->num_blocks = num_blocks;
     548           0 :         goto end;

     550           0 :         if ((ret = av_grow_packet(info->pkt, pkt->size)) < 0)
     551           0 :             goto end;

     553           0 :         info->num_blocks += num_blocks;

     566           0 :     return ret;

     569           0 : static int mov_write_eac3_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
     570             : {
     571           0 :     PutBitContext pbc;
     572           0 :     uint8_t *buf;
     573           0 :     struct eac3_info *info;
     574           0 :     int size, i;
     575             : 
     576           0 :     if (!track->eac3_priv) {
     577           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,
     578             :                "Cannot write moov atom before EAC3 packets parsed.\n");
     579           0 :         return AVERROR(EINVAL);
     580             :     }
     581             :

     585           0 :     if (!buf) {

     587             :     }

     655           0 : static unsigned compute_avg_bitrate(MOVTrack *track)
     656             : {
     657           0 :     uint64_t size = 0;
     658           0 :     int i;
     659           0 :     if (!track->track_duration)
     660             :         return 0;
     661           0 :     for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++)
     662           0 :         size += track->cluster[i].size;
     663           0 :     return size * 8 * track->timescale / track->track_duration;

     666             : struct mpeg4_bit_rate_values {
     667             :     uint32_t buffer_size;  ///< Size of the decoding buffer for the elementary stream in bytes.
     668             :     uint32_t max_bit_rate; ///< Maximum rate in bits/second over any window of one second.
     669             :     uint32_t avg_bit_rate; ///< Average rate in bits/second over the entire presentation.
     670             : };
     671             : 
     672           0 : static struct mpeg4_bit_rate_values calculate_mpeg4_bit_rates(MOVTrack *track)
     673             : {
     674           0 :     AVCPBProperties *props = track->st ?
     675           0 :         (AVCPBProperties*)av_stream_get_side_data(track->st,
     676             :                                                   AV_PKT_DATA_CPB_PROPERTIES,
     677           0 :                                                   NULL) :
     678             :         NULL;
     679           0 :     struct mpeg4_bit_rate_values bit_rates = { 0 };
     680             : 
     681           0 :     bit_rates.avg_bit_rate = compute_avg_bitrate(track);
     682           0 :     if (!bit_rates.avg_bit_rate) {
     683             :         // if the average bit rate cannot be calculated at this point, such as
     684             :         // in the case of fragmented MP4, utilize the following values as
     685             :         // fall-back in priority order:
     686             :         //
     687             :         // 1. average bit rate property
     688             :         // 2. bit rate (usually average over the whole clip)
     689             :         // 3. maximum bit rate property
     690             : 
     691           0 :         if (props && props->avg_bitrate) {
     692           0 :             bit_rates.avg_bit_rate = props->avg_bitrate;
     693           0 :         } else if (track->par->bit_rate) {
     694           0 :             bit_rates.avg_bit_rate = track->par->bit_rate;
     695           0 :         } else if (props && props->max_bitrate) {
     696           0 :             bit_rates.avg_bit_rate = props->max_bitrate;
     697             :         }
     698             :     }
     699             : 
     700             :     // (FIXME should be max rate in any 1 sec window)
     701           0 :     bit_rates.max_bit_rate = FFMAX(track->par->bit_rate,
     702             :                                    bit_rates.avg_bit_rate);
     703             : 
     704             :     // utilize values from properties if we have them available
     705           0 :     if (props) {
     706           0 :         bit_rates.max_bit_rate = FFMAX(bit_rates.max_bit_rate,
     707             :                                        props->max_bitrate);
     708           0 :         bit_rates.buffer_size = props->buffer_size / 8;
     709             :     }
     710             : 
     711           0 :     return bit_rates;
     712             : }

     714           0 : static int mov_write_esds_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track) // Basic
     715             : {
     716           0 :     struct mpeg4_bit_rate_values bit_rates = calculate_mpeg4_bit_rates(track);
     717           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
     718           0 :     int decoder_specific_info_len = track->vos_len ? 5 + track->vos_len : 0;
     719             : 
     720           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // size
     721           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "esds");
     722           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); // Version
     723             : 
     724             :     // ES descriptor
     725           0 :     put_descr(pb, 0x03, 3 + 5+13 + decoder_specific_info_len + 5+1);
     726           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, track->track_id);
     727           0 :     avio_w8(pb, 0x00); // flags (= no flags)
     728             : 
     729             :     // DecoderConfig descriptor
     730           0 :     put_descr(pb, 0x04, 13 + decoder_specific_info_len);
     731             : 
     732             :     // Object type indication
     733           0 :     if ((track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MP2 ||
     734           0 :          track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MP3) &&
     735           0 :         track->par->sample_rate > 24000)
     736           0 :         avio_w8(pb, 0x6B); // 11172-3
     737             :     else
     738           0 :         avio_w8(pb, ff_codec_get_tag(ff_mp4_obj_type, track->par->codec_id));
     739             : 
     740             :     // the following fields is made of 6 bits to identify the streamtype (4 for video, 5 for audio)
     741             :     // plus 1 bit to indicate upstream and 1 bit set to 1 (reserved)
     742           0 :     if (track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_DVD_SUBTITLE)
     743           0 :         avio_w8(pb, (0x38 << 2) | 1); // flags (= NeroSubpicStream)
     744           0 :     else if (track->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO)
     745           0 :         avio_w8(pb, 0x15); // flags (= Audiostream)
     746             :     else
     747           0 :         avio_w8(pb, 0x11); // flags (= Visualstream)
     748             : 
     749           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, bit_rates.buffer_size); // Buffersize DB
     750           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, bit_rates.max_bit_rate); // maxbitrate
     751           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, bit_rates.avg_bit_rate);
     752             : 
     753           0 :     if (track->vos_len) {
     754             :         // DecoderSpecific info descriptor
     755           0 :         put_descr(pb, 0x05, track->vos_len);
     756           0 :         avio_write(pb, track->vos_data, track->vos_len);
     757             :     }
     758             : 
     759             :     // SL descriptor
     760           0 :     put_descr(pb, 0x06, 1);
     761           0 :     avio_w8(pb, 0x02);
     762           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
     763             : }

     782             : {
     783           0 :     int ret;

     785           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0);

     986           0 : static int mov_write_dvc1_structs(MOVTrack *track, uint8_t *buf)
     987             : {
     988           0 :     uint8_t *unescaped;
     989           0 :     const uint8_t *start, *next, *end = track->vos_data + track->vos_len;
     990           0 :     int unescaped_size, seq_found = 0;
     991           0 :     int level = 0, interlace = 0;
     992           0 :     int packet_seq   = track->vc1_info.packet_seq;
     993           0 :     int packet_entry = track->vc1_info.packet_entry;
     994           0 :     int slices       = track->vc1_info.slices;
     995           0 :     PutBitContext pbc;
     996             : 
     997           0 :     if (track->start_dts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
     998             :         /* No packets written yet, vc1_info isn't authoritative yet. */
     999             :         /* Assume inline sequence and entry headers. */
    1000           0 :         packet_seq = packet_entry = 1;
    1001           0 :         av_log(NULL, AV_LOG_WARNING,
    1002             :                "moov atom written before any packets, unable to write correct "
    1003             :                "dvc1 atom. Set the delay_moov flag to fix this.\n");
    1004             :     }
    1005             : 
    1006           0 :     unescaped = av_mallocz(track->vos_len + AV_INPUT_BUFFER_PADDING_SIZE);
    1007           0 :     if (!unescaped)
    1008             :         return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
    1009           0 :     start = find_next_marker(track->vos_data, end);
    1010           0 :     for (next = start; next < end; start = next) {
    1011           0 :         GetBitContext gb;
    1012           0 :         int size;
    1013           0 :         next = find_next_marker(start + 4, end);
    1014           0 :         size = next - start - 4;
    1015           0 :         if (size <= 0)
    1016           0 :             continue;
    1017           0 :         unescaped_size = vc1_unescape_buffer(start + 4, size, unescaped);
    1018           0 :         init_get_bits(&gb, unescaped, 8 * unescaped_size);
    1019           0 :         if (AV_RB32(start) == VC1_CODE_SEQHDR) {
    1020           0 :             int profile = get_bits(&gb, 2);
    1021           0 :             if (profile != PROFILE_ADVANCED) {
    1022           0 :                 av_free(unescaped);
    1023           0 :                 return AVERROR(ENOSYS);
    1024             :             }
    1025           0 :             seq_found = 1;
    1026           0 :             level = get_bits(&gb, 3);
    1027             :             /* chromaformat, frmrtq_postproc, bitrtq_postproc, postprocflag,
    1028             :              * width, height */
    1029           0 :             skip_bits_long(&gb, 2 + 3 + 5 + 1 + 2*12);
    1030           0 :             skip_bits(&gb, 1); /* broadcast */
    1031           0 :             interlace = get_bits1(&gb);
    1032           0 :             skip_bits(&gb, 4); /* tfcntrflag, finterpflag, reserved, psf */
    1033             :         }
    1034             :     }
    1035           0 :     if (!seq_found) {
    1036           0 :         av_free(unescaped);
    1037           0 :         return AVERROR(ENOSYS);
    1038             :     }
    1039             : 
    1040           0 :     init_put_bits(&pbc, buf, 7);
    1041             :     /* VC1DecSpecStruc */
    1042           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 4, 12); /* profile - advanced */
    1043           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 3, level);
    1044           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, 0); /* reserved */
    1045             :     /* VC1AdvDecSpecStruc */
    1046           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 3, level);
    1047           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, 0); /* cbr */
    1048           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 6, 0); /* reserved */
    1049           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, !interlace); /* no interlace */
    1050           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, !packet_seq); /* no multiple seq */
    1051           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, !packet_entry); /* no multiple entry */
    1052           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, !slices); /* no slice code */
    1053           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, 0); /* no bframe */
    1054           0 :     put_bits(&pbc, 1, 0); /* reserved */
    1055             :

    1158             :             return 0;

    1182           0 : static int mov_write_audio_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov, MOVTrack *track)
    1183             : {
    1184           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    1185           0 :     int version = 0;
    1186           0 :     uint32_t tag = track->tag;
    1187           0 :     int ret = 0;
    1188             : 
    1189           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_MOV) {
    1190           0 :         if (track->timescale > UINT16_MAX || !track->par->ch_layout.nb_channels) {
    1191           0 :             if (mov_get_lpcm_flags(track->par->codec_id))
    1192           0 :                 tag = AV_RL32("lpcm");
    1193             :             version = 2;
    1194           0 :         } else if (track->audio_vbr || mov_pcm_le_gt16(track->par->codec_id) ||
    1195           0 :                    mov_pcm_be_gt16(track->par->codec_id) ||
    1196           0 :                    track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_ADPCM_MS ||
    1197           0 :                    track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_ADPCM_IMA_WAV ||
    1198             :                    track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_QDM2) {
    1199             :             version = 1;
    1200             :         }
    1201             :     }
    1202             : 
    1203           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
    1204           0 :     if (mov->encryption_scheme != MOV_ENC_NONE) {
    1205           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "enca");
    1206             :     } else {
    1207           0 :         avio_wl32(pb, tag); // store it byteswapped
    1208             :     }
    1209           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* Reserved */
    1210           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 0); /* Reserved */
    1211           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 1); /* Data-reference index, XXX  == 1 */
    1212             : 
    1213             :     /* SoundDescription */
    1214           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, version); /* Version */
    1215           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 0); /* Revision level */
    1216           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* Reserved */
    1217             : 
    1218           0 :     if (version == 2) {
    1219           0 :         avio_wb16(pb, 3);
    1220           0 :         avio_wb16(pb, 16);
    1221           0 :         avio_wb16(pb, 0xfffe);
    1222           0 :         avio_wb16(pb, 0);
    1223           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 0x00010000);
    1224           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 72);
    1225           0 :         avio_wb64(pb, av_double2int(track->par->sample_rate));
    1226           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, track->par->ch_layout.nb_channels);
    1227           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 0x7F000000);

    1490           0 : static int mov_get_dv_codec_tag(AVFormatContext *s, MOVTrack *track)
    1491             : {
    1492           0 :     int tag;
    1493             : 
    1494           0 :     if (track->par->width == 720) { /* SD */

    1497           0 :             else                                            tag = MKTAG('d','v','c',' ');
    1498           0 :        }else if (track->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P) tag = MKTAG('d','v','5','p');
    1499           0 :         else if (track->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P) tag = MKTAG('d','v','c','p');
    1500           0 :         else                                                tag = MKTAG('d','v','p','p');
    1501           0 :     } else if (track->par->height == 720) { /* HD 720 line */
    1502           0 :         if  (track->st->time_base.den == 50)                tag = MKTAG('d','v','h','q');
    1503           0 :         else                                                tag = MKTAG('d','v','h','p');
    1504           0 :     } else if (track->par->height == 1080) { /* HD 1080 line */
    1505           0 :         if  (track->st->time_base.den == 25)                tag = MKTAG('d','v','h','5');
    1506           0 :         else                                                tag = MKTAG('d','v','h','6');
    1507             :     } else {
    1508           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR, "unsupported height for dv codec\n");
    1509           0 :         return 0;
    1510             :     }
    1511             : 
    1512             :     return tag;
    1513             : }

    1626           0 :                 if      (rate == 24) tag = MKTAG('a','i','1','3');

    1701           0 : static unsigned int mov_get_codec_tag(AVFormatContext *s, MOVTrack *track)
    1702             : {
    1703           0 :     unsigned int tag = track->par->codec_tag;
    1704             :

    1706             :     // (with rtp_ctx) from other tracks.

    1708             :         tag = 0;

    1713             :                   track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_H264 ||
    1714             :                   track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_DNXHD ||
    1715           0 :                   track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO ||
    1716           0 :                   av_get_bits_per_sample(track->par->codec_id)))) { // pcm audio

    1721           0 :         else if (track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO)

    1997           0 : static int mov_write_pasp_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)

    2010           0 : static int mov_write_gama_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track, double gamma)
    2011             : {
    2012           0 :     uint32_t gama = 0;
    2013           0 :     if (gamma <= 0.0) {
    2014           0 :         gamma = avpriv_get_gamma_from_trc(track->par->color_trc);
    2015             :     }
    2016           0 :     av_log(s, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "gamma value %g\n", gamma);
    2017             : 
    2018           0 :     if (gamma > 1e-6) {
    2019           0 :         gama = (uint32_t)lrint((double)(1<<16) * gamma);
    2020           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "writing gama value %"PRId32"\n", gama);
    2021             : 
    2022           0 :         av_assert0(track->mode == MODE_MOV);
    2023           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 12);
    2024           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "gama");
    2025           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, gama);
    2026           0 :         return 12;
    2027             :     } else {
    2028           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_WARNING, "gamma value unknown, unable to write gama atom\n");
    2029             :     }
    2030           0 :     return 0;
    2031             : }
    2032             : 
    2033           0 : static int mov_write_colr_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track, int prefer_icc)
    2034             : {
    2035           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    2036             : 
    2037             :     // Ref (MOV): https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/technotes/tn2162/_index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/DTS40013070-CH1-TNTAG9
    2038             :     // Ref (MP4): ISO/IEC 14496-12:2012
    2039             : 
    2040           0 :     const uint8_t *icc_profile;
    2041           0 :     size_t icc_profile_size;
    2042             : 
    2043           0 :     if (prefer_icc) {
    2044           0 :         icc_profile = av_stream_get_side_data(track->st, AV_PKT_DATA_ICC_PROFILE, &icc_profile_size);
    2045             : 
    2046           0 :         if (icc_profile) {
    2047           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, 12 + icc_profile_size);
    2048           0 :             ffio_wfourcc(pb, "colr");
    2049           0 :             ffio_wfourcc(pb, "prof");
    2050           0 :             avio_write(pb, icc_profile, icc_profile_size);
    2051           0 :             return 12 + icc_profile_size;
    2052             :         }
    2053             :         else {
    2054           0 :             av_log(NULL, AV_LOG_INFO, "no ICC profile found, will write nclx/nclc colour info instead\n");
    2055             :         }
    2056             :     }
    2057             : 
    2058             :     /* We should only ever be called for MOV, MP4 and AVIF. */
    2059           0 :     av_assert0(track->mode == MODE_MOV || track->mode == MODE_MP4 ||
    2060             :                track->mode == MODE_AVIF);
    2061             : 
    2062           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
    2063           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "colr");
    2064           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_MP4 || track->mode == MODE_AVIF)
    2065           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "nclx");
    2066             :     else
    2067           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "nclc");
    2068             :     // Do not try to guess the color info if it is AVCOL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED.
    2069             :     // e.g., Dolby Vision for Apple devices should be set to AVCOL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED. See
    2070             :     // https://developer.apple.com/av-foundation/High-Dynamic-Range-Metadata-for-Apple-Devices.pdf
    2071           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, track->par->color_primaries);
    2072           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, track->par->color_trc);
    2073           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, track->par->color_space);
    2074           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_MP4 || track->mode == MODE_AVIF) {
    2075           0 :         int full_range = track->par->color_range == AVCOL_RANGE_JPEG;
    2076           0 :         avio_w8(pb, full_range << 7);
    2077             :     }
    2078             : 
    2079           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
    2080             : }

    2100           0 : static inline int64_t rescale_mdcv(AVRational q, int b)
    2101             : {
    2102           0 :     return av_rescale(q.num, b, q.den);

    2105           0 : static int mov_write_mdcv_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
    2106             : {
    2107           0 :     const int chroma_den = 50000;
    2108           0 :     const int luma_den = 10000;
    2109           0 :     const uint8_t *side_data;
    2110           0 :     const AVMasteringDisplayMetadata *metadata;
    2111             : 
    2112           0 :     side_data = av_stream_get_side_data(track->st, AV_PKT_DATA_MASTERING_DISPLAY_METADATA, NULL);
    2113           0 :     metadata = (const AVMasteringDisplayMetadata*)side_data;
    2114           0 :     if (!metadata || !metadata->has_primaries || !metadata->has_luminance) {
    2115             :         return 0;
    2116             :     }
    2117             : 
    2118           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 32); // size
    2119           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "mdcv");
    2120           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[1][0], chroma_den));
    2121           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[1][1], chroma_den));
    2122           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[2][0], chroma_den));
    2123           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[2][1], chroma_den));
    2124           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[0][0], chroma_den));
    2125           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->display_primaries[0][1], chroma_den));
    2126           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->white_point[0], chroma_den));
    2127           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->white_point[1], chroma_den));

    2129           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, rescale_mdcv(metadata->min_luminance, luma_den));
    2130           0 :     return 32;

    2133           0 : static void find_compressor(char * compressor_name, int len, MOVTrack *track)
    2134             : {
    2135           0 :     AVDictionaryEntry *encoder;
    2136           0 :     int xdcam_res =  (track->par->width == 1280 && track->par->height == 720)
    2137           0 :                   || (track->par->width == 1440 && track->par->height == 1080)
    2138           0 :                   || (track->par->width == 1920 && track->par->height == 1080);
    2139             : 
    2140           0 :     if ((track->mode == MODE_AVIF ||
    2141           0 :          track->mode == MODE_MOV ||
    2142           0 :          track->mode == MODE_MP4) &&
    2143           0 :         (encoder = av_dict_get(track->st->metadata, "encoder", NULL, 0))) {
    2144           0 :         av_strlcpy(compressor_name, encoder->value, 32);
    2145           0 :     } else if (track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO && xdcam_res) {
    2146           0 :         int interlaced = track->par->field_order > AV_FIELD_PROGRESSIVE;
    2147           0 :         AVStream *st = track->st;
    2148           0 :         int rate = defined_frame_rate(NULL, st);
    2149           0 :         av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, "XDCAM");
    2150           0 :         if (track->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P) {
    2151           0 :             av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, " HD422");
    2152           0 :         } else if(track->par->width == 1440) {
    2153           0 :             av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, " HD");
    2154             :         } else
    2155           0 :             av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, " EX");
    2156             : 
    2157           0 :         av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, " %d%c", track->par->height, interlaced ? 'i' : 'p');
    2158             : 
    2159           0 :         av_strlcatf(compressor_name, len, "%d", rate * (interlaced + 1));
    2160             :     }
    2161           0 : }
    2162             : 
    2163           0 : static int mov_write_ccst_tag(AVIOContext *pb)
    2164             : {
    2165           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    2166             :     // Write sane defaults:
    2167             :     // all_ref_pics_intra = 0 : all samples can use any type of reference.
    2168             :     // intra_pred_used = 1 : intra prediction may or may not be used.
    2169             :     // max_ref_per_pic = 15 : reserved value to indicate that any number of
    2170             :     //                        reference images can be used.
    2171           0 :     uint8_t ccstValue = (0 << 7) |  /* all_ref_pics_intra */
    2172             :                         (1 << 6) |  /* intra_pred_used */
    2173             :                         (15 << 2);  /* max_ref_per_pic */
    2174           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
    2175           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "ccst");
    2176           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* Version & flags */
    2177           0 :     avio_w8(pb, ccstValue);
    2178           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, 0);  /* reserved */
    2179           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
    2180             : }

    2193             :                            ||  track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_V410
    2194           0 :                            ||  track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_V210);
    2195             : 
    2196           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */

    2198           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "encv");
    2199             :     } else {

    2201             :     }

    2222           0 :         ffio_fill(pb, 0, 3 * 4); /* Reserved */

    2372           0 : static int mov_write_rtp_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
    2373             : {
    2374           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    2375           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */

    2600           0 : static int mov_preroll_write_stbl_atoms(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
    2601             : {
    2602           0 :     struct sgpd_entry {
    2603             :         int count;
    2604             :         int16_t roll_distance;
    2605             :         int group_description_index;
    2606             :     };
    2607             : 
    2608           0 :     struct sgpd_entry *sgpd_entries = NULL;
    2609           0 :     int entries = -1;
    2610           0 :     int group = 0;
    2611           0 :     int i, j;
    2612             : 
    2613           0 :     const int OPUS_SEEK_PREROLL_MS = 80;
    2614           0 :     int roll_samples = av_rescale_q(OPUS_SEEK_PREROLL_MS,
    2615           0 :                                     (AVRational){1, 1000},
    2616           0 :                                     (AVRational){1, 48000});
    2617             : 
    2618           0 :     if (!track->entry)
    2619             :         return 0;
    2620             : 
    2621           0 :     sgpd_entries = av_malloc_array(track->entry, sizeof(*sgpd_entries));
    2622           0 :     if (!sgpd_entries)
    2623             :         return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
    2624             : 
    2625           0 :     av_assert0(track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_OPUS || track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_AAC);
    2626             : 
    2627           0 :     if (track->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_OPUS) {
    2628           0 :         for (i = 0; i < track->entry; i++) {
    2629           0 :             int roll_samples_remaining = roll_samples;
    2630           0 :             int distance = 0;
    2631           0 :             for (j = i - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
    2632           0 :                 roll_samples_remaining -= get_cluster_duration(track, j);
    2633           0 :                 distance++;
    2634           0 :                 if (roll_samples_remaining <= 0)
    2635             :                     break;
    2636             :             }
    2637             :             /* We don't have enough preceeding samples to compute a valid
    2638             :                roll_distance here, so this sample can't be independently
    2639             :                decoded. */
    2640           0 :             if (roll_samples_remaining > 0)
    2641             :                 distance = 0;
    2642             :             /* Verify distance is a maximum of 32 (2.5ms) packets. */
    2643           0 :             if (distance > 32)
    2644             :                 return AVERROR_INVALIDDATA;
    2645           0 :             if (i && distance == sgpd_entries[entries].roll_distance) {
    2646           0 :                 sgpd_entries[entries].count++;
    2647             :             } else {
    2648           0 :                 entries++;
    2649           0 :                 sgpd_entries[entries].count = 1;
    2650           0 :                 sgpd_entries[entries].roll_distance = distance;
    2651           0 :                 sgpd_entries[entries].group_description_index = distance ? ++group : 0;
    2652             :             }
    2653             :         }
    2654             :     } else {
    2655           0 :         entries++;
    2656           0 :         sgpd_entries[entries].count = track->sample_count;
    2657           0 :         sgpd_entries[entries].roll_distance = 1;
    2658           0 :         sgpd_entries[entries].group_description_index = ++group;
    2659             :     }
    2660           0 :     entries++;
    2661             : 
    2662           0 :     if (!group) {
    2663           0 :         av_free(sgpd_entries);
    2664           0 :         return 0;
    2665             :     }
    2666             : 
    2667             :     /* Write sgpd tag */

    2676           0 :             avio_wb16(pb, -sgpd_entries[i].roll_distance); /* roll_distance */
    2677             :         }

    2780           0 : static int mov_write_gmhd_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)

    2793           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 0);      /* reserved */
    2794             : 
    2795             :     /*
    2796             :      * This special text atom is required for
    2797             :      * Apple Quicktime chapters. The contents
    2798             :      * don't appear to be documented, so the
    2799             :      * bytes are copied verbatim.
    2800             :      */
    2801           0 :     if (track->tag != MKTAG('c','6','0','8')) {
    2802           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x2C);   /* size */
    2803           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "text");

    2805           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x00);
    2806           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x00);
    2807           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x00);
    2808           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x01);

    2812           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0x00004000);
    2813           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 0x0000);
    2814             :     }
    2815             : 
    2816           0 :     if (track->par->codec_tag == MKTAG('t','m','c','d')) {
    2817           0 :         int64_t tmcd_pos = avio_tell(pb);
    2818           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */

    2857           0 : static int mov_write_hdlr_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)
    2858             : {
    2859           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    2860           0 :     const char *hdlr, *descr = NULL, *hdlr_type = NULL;
    2861           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    2862           0 :     size_t descr_len;
    2863             : 
    2864           0 :     hdlr      = "dhlr";
    2865           0 :     hdlr_type = "url ";
    2866           0 :     descr     = "DataHandler";
    2867             : 
    2868           0 :     if (track) {
    2869           0 :         hdlr = (track->mode == MODE_MOV) ? "mhlr" : "\0\0\0\0";
    2870           0 :         if (track->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO) {
    2871           0 :             if (track->mode == MODE_AVIF) {
    2872           0 :                 hdlr_type = (track == &mov->tracks[0]) ? "pict" : "auxv";
    2873             :                 descr     = "PictureHandler";
    2874             :             } else {
    2875             :                 hdlr_type = "vide";
    2876             :                 descr     = "VideoHandler";
    2877             :             }
    2878           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO) {
    2879             :             hdlr_type = "soun";
    2880             :             descr     = "SoundHandler";
    2881           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_SUBTITLE) {
    2882           0 :             if (is_clcp_track(track)) {
    2883             :                 hdlr_type = "clcp";
    2884             :                 descr = "ClosedCaptionHandler";
    2885             :             } else {
    2886           0 :                 if (track->tag == MKTAG('t','x','3','g')) {
    2887             :                     hdlr_type = "sbtl";
    2888           0 :                 } else if (track->tag == MKTAG('m','p','4','s')) {
    2889             :                     hdlr_type = "subp";
    2890           0 :                 } else if (track->tag == MOV_MP4_TTML_TAG) {
    2891             :                     hdlr_type = "subt";
    2892             :                 } else {
    2893           0 :                     hdlr_type = "text";
    2894             :                 }
    2895             :                 descr = "SubtitleHandler";
    2896             :             }
    2897           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_tag == MKTAG('r','t','p',' ')) {
    2898             :             hdlr_type = "hint";
    2899             :             descr     = "HintHandler";
    2900           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_tag == MKTAG('t','m','c','d')) {
    2901             :             hdlr_type = "tmcd";
    2902             :             descr = "TimeCodeHandler";
    2903           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_tag == MKTAG('g','p','m','d')) {

    2906             :         } else {

    2924             : 
    2925           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
    2926           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "hdlr");

    2928           0 :     avio_write(pb, hdlr, 4); /* handler */
    2929           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, hdlr_type); /* handler type */
    2930           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* reserved */
    2931           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* reserved */
    2932           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* reserved */

    2934           0 :     if (!track || track->mode == MODE_MOV)

    3123           0 : static int mov_write_minf_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov, MOVTrack *track)

    3159             : 
    3160           0 : static void get_pts_range(MOVMuxContext *mov, MOVTrack *track,
    3161             :                           int64_t *start, int64_t *end)
    3162             : {
    3163           0 :     if (track->tag == MKTAG('t','m','c','d') && mov->nb_meta_tmcd) {
    3164             :         // tmcd tracks gets track_duration set in mov_write_moov_tag from
    3165             :         // another track's duration, while the end_pts may be left at zero.
    3166             :         // Calculate the pts duration for that track instead.
    3167           0 :         get_pts_range(mov, &mov->tracks[track->src_track], start, end);
    3168           0 :         *start = av_rescale(*start, track->timescale,
    3169           0 :                             mov->tracks[track->src_track].timescale);
    3170           0 :         *end   = av_rescale(*end, track->timescale,
    3171             :                             mov->tracks[track->src_track].timescale);
    3172           0 :         return;
    3173             :     }
    3174           0 :     if (track->end_pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE &&
    3175           0 :         track->start_dts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE &&
    3176           0 :         track->start_cts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
    3177           0 :         *start = track->start_dts + track->start_cts;
    3178           0 :         *end   = track->end_pts;
    3179           0 :         return;
    3180             :     }
    3181           0 :     *start = 0;
    3182           0 :     *end   = track->track_duration;
    3183             : }
    3184             : 
    3185           0 : static int64_t calc_samples_pts_duration(MOVMuxContext *mov, MOVTrack *track)
    3186             : {
    3187           0 :     int64_t start, end;
    3188           0 :     get_pts_range(mov, track, &start, &end);
    3189           0 :     return end - start;
    3190             : }
    3191             : 
    3192             : // Calculate the actual duration of the track, after edits.
    3193             : // If it starts with a pts < 0, that is removed by the edit list.
    3194             : // If it starts with a pts > 0, the edit list adds a delay before that.
    3195             : // Thus, with edit lists enabled, the post-edit output of the file is
    3196             : // starting with pts=0.
    3197           0 : static int64_t calc_pts_duration(MOVMuxContext *mov, MOVTrack *track)
    3198             : {
    3199           0 :     int64_t start, end;
    3200           0 :     get_pts_range(mov, track, &start, &end);
    3201           0 :     if (mov->use_editlist != 0)
    3202           0 :         start = 0;
    3203           0 :     return end - start;
    3204             : }
    3205             : 
    3206           0 : static int mov_write_mdhd_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    3207             :                               MOVTrack *track)
    3208             : {
    3209           0 :     int64_t duration = calc_samples_pts_duration(mov, track);
    3210           0 :     int version = duration < INT32_MAX ? 0 : 1;
    3211             : 
    3212           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_ISM)
    3213             :         version = 1;
    3214             : 
    3215           0 :     (version == 1) ? avio_wb32(pb, 44) : avio_wb32(pb, 32); /* size */
    3216           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "mdhd");
    3217           0 :     avio_w8(pb, version);

    3261             : /* transformation matrix

    3265           0 : static void write_matrix(AVIOContext *pb, int16_t a, int16_t b, int16_t c,
    3266             :                          int16_t d, int16_t tx, int16_t ty)

    3412             : // This box seems important for the psp playback ... without it the movie seems to hang
    3413           0 : static int mov_write_edts_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    3414             :                               MOVTrack *track)
    3415             : {
    3416           0 :     int64_t duration = av_rescale_rnd(calc_samples_pts_duration(mov, track),
    3417           0 :                                       mov->movie_timescale, track->timescale,
    3418             :                                       AV_ROUND_UP);
    3419           0 :     int version = duration < INT32_MAX ? 0 : 1;
    3420           0 :     int entry_size, entry_count, size;
    3421           0 :     int64_t delay, start_ct = track->start_cts;
    3422           0 :     int64_t start_dts = track->start_dts;
    3423             : 
    3424           0 :     if (track->entry) {
    3425           0 :         if (start_dts != track->cluster[0].dts || start_ct != track->cluster[0].cts) {
    3426             : 
    3427           0 :             av_log(mov->fc, AV_LOG_DEBUG,
    3428             :                    "EDTS using dts:%"PRId64" cts:%d instead of dts:%"PRId64" cts:%"PRId64" tid:%d\n",

    3430             :                    start_dts, start_ct, track->track_id);
    3431           0 :             start_dts = track->cluster[0].dts;
    3432           0 :             start_ct  = track->cluster[0].cts;
    3433             :         }
    3434             :     }
    3435             : 
    3436           0 :     delay = av_rescale_rnd(start_dts + start_ct, mov->movie_timescale,
    3437           0 :                            track->timescale, AV_ROUND_DOWN);
    3438           0 :     version |= delay < INT32_MAX ? 0 : 1;
    3439             : 
    3440           0 :     entry_size = (version == 1) ? 20 : 12;
    3441           0 :     entry_count = 1 + (delay > 0);
    3442           0 :     size = 24 + entry_count * entry_size;
    3443             : 
    3444             :     /* write the atom data */
    3445           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, size);
    3446           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "edts");
    3447           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, size - 8);
    3448           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "elst");
    3449           0 :     avio_w8(pb, version);
    3450           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, 0); /* flags */
    3451             : 
    3452           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, entry_count);
    3453           0 :     if (delay > 0) { /* add an empty edit to delay presentation */
    3454             :         /* In the positive delay case, the delay includes the cts
    3455             :          * offset, and the second edit list entry below trims out
    3456             :          * the same amount from the actual content. This makes sure
    3457             :          * that the offset last sample is included in the edit
    3458             :          * list duration as well. */
    3459           0 :         if (version == 1) {
    3460           0 :             avio_wb64(pb, delay);
    3461           0 :             avio_wb64(pb, -1);
    3462             :         } else {
    3463           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, delay);
    3464           0 :             avio_wb32(pb, -1);
    3465             :         }
    3466           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 0x00010000);

    3469             :          * special meaning. Normally start_ct should end up positive or zero
    3470             :          * here, but use FFMIN in case dts is a small positive integer
    3471             :          * rounded to 0 when represented in movie timescale units. */

    3476             :          * dts<0 pts=0. */
    3477           0 :         duration += delay;
    3478             :     }
    3479             : 
    3480             :     /* For fragmented files, we don't know the full length yet. Setting
    3481             :      * duration to 0 allows us to only specify the offset, including

    3641           0 : static int mov_write_trak_tag(AVFormatContext *s, AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    3642             :                               MOVTrack *track, AVStream *st)
    3643             : {
    3644           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    3645           0 :     int entry_backup = track->entry;
    3646           0 :     int chunk_backup = track->chunkCount;
    3647           0 :     int ret;
    3648             : 
    3649             :     /* If we want to have an empty moov, but some samples already have been
    3650             :      * buffered (delay_moov), pretend that no samples have been written yet. */

    4222           0 :            (((str[1] - 0x60) & 0x1F) <<  5) +

    4382             : 
    4383           0 : static void build_chunks(MOVTrack *trk)
    4384             : {
    4385           0 :     int i;
    4386           0 :     MOVIentry *chunk = &trk->cluster[0];
    4387           0 :     uint64_t chunkSize = chunk->size;
    4388           0 :     chunk->chunkNum = 1;
    4389           0 :     if (trk->chunkCount)
    4390             :         return;
    4391           0 :     trk->chunkCount = 1;
    4392           0 :     for (i = 1; i<trk->entry; i++){
    4393           0 :         if (chunk->pos + chunkSize == trk->cluster[i].pos &&
    4394           0 :             chunkSize + trk->cluster[i].size < (1<<20)){
    4395           0 :             chunkSize             += trk->cluster[i].size;
    4396           0 :             chunk->samples_in_chunk += trk->cluster[i].entries;
    4397             :         } else {
    4398           0 :             trk->cluster[i].chunkNum = chunk->chunkNum+1;
    4399           0 :             chunk=&trk->cluster[i];
    4400           0 :             chunkSize = chunk->size;
    4401           0 :             trk->chunkCount++;
    4402             :         }
    4403             :     }
    4404             : }
    4405             : 
    4406             : /**
    4407             :  * Assign track ids. If option "use_stream_ids_as_track_ids" is set,
    4408             :  * the stream ids are used as track ids.
    4409             :  *
    4410             :  * This assumes mov->tracks and s->streams are in the same order and
    4411             :  * there are no gaps in either of them (so mov->tracks[n] refers to
    4412             :  * s->streams[n]).
    4413             :  *
    4414             :  * As an exception, there can be more entries in
    4415             :  * s->streams than in mov->tracks, in which case new track ids are
    4416             :  * generated (starting after the largest found stream id).
    4417             :  */
    4418           0 : static int mov_setup_track_ids(MOVMuxContext *mov, AVFormatContext *s)
    4419             : {
    4420           0 :     int i;
    4421             : 
    4422           0 :     if (mov->track_ids_ok)
    4423             :         return 0;
    4424             : 
    4425           0 :     if (mov->use_stream_ids_as_track_ids) {
    4426             :         int next_generated_track_id = 0;
    4427           0 :         for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    4428           0 :             if (s->streams[i]->id > next_generated_track_id)
    4429             :                 next_generated_track_id = s->streams[i]->id;
    4430             :         }
    4431             : 
    4432           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4433           0 :             if (mov->tracks[i].entry <= 0 && !(mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT))
    4434           0 :                 continue;
    4435             : 
    4436           0 :             mov->tracks[i].track_id = i >= s->nb_streams ? ++next_generated_track_id : s->streams[i]->id;
    4437             :         }
    4438             :     } else {
    4439           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4440           0 :             if (mov->tracks[i].entry <= 0 && !(mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT))
    4441           0 :                 continue;
    4442             : 
    4443           0 :             mov->tracks[i].track_id = i + 1;
    4444             :         }
    4445             :     }
    4446             : 
    4447           0 :     mov->track_ids_ok = 1;
    4448             : 
    4449           0 :     return 0;
    4450             : }
    4451             : 
    4452           0 : static int mov_write_moov_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4453             :                               AVFormatContext *s)
    4454             : {
    4455           0 :     int i;
    4456           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    4457           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size placeholder*/
    4458           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "moov");
    4459             : 
    4460           0 :     mov_setup_track_ids(mov, s);
    4461             : 
    4462           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4463           0 :         if (mov->tracks[i].entry <= 0 && !(mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT))
    4464           0 :             continue;
    4465             : 
    4466           0 :         mov->tracks[i].time     = mov->time;
    4467             : 
    4468           0 :         if (mov->tracks[i].entry)
    4469           0 :             build_chunks(&mov->tracks[i]);
    4470             :     }
    4471             : 
    4472           0 :     if (mov->chapter_track)
    4473           0 :         for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    4474           0 :             mov->tracks[i].tref_tag = MKTAG('c','h','a','p');
    4475           0 :             mov->tracks[i].tref_id  = mov->tracks[mov->chapter_track].track_id;
    4476             :         }
    4477           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4478           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    4479           0 :         if (track->tag == MKTAG('r','t','p',' ')) {
    4480           0 :             track->tref_tag = MKTAG('h','i','n','t');
    4481           0 :             track->tref_id = mov->tracks[track->src_track].track_id;
    4482           0 :         } else if (track->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO) {
    4483           0 :             size_t size;
    4484           0 :             int *fallback;
    4485           0 :             fallback = (int*)av_stream_get_side_data(track->st,

    4493             :             }
    4494             :         }

    4687           0 : static int mov_write_tfhd_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4688             :                               MOVTrack *track, int64_t moof_offset)
    4689             : {
    4690           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);

    4692             :                      MOV_TFHD_BASE_DATA_OFFSET;
    4693           0 :     if (!track->entry) {
    4694             :         flags |= MOV_TFHD_DURATION_IS_EMPTY;
    4695             :     } else {
    4696           0 :         flags |= MOV_TFHD_DEFAULT_FLAGS;
    4697             :     }
    4698           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_OMIT_TFHD_OFFSET)
    4699           0 :         flags &= ~MOV_TFHD_BASE_DATA_OFFSET;
    4700           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_DEFAULT_BASE_MOOF) {
    4701           0 :         flags &= ~MOV_TFHD_BASE_DATA_OFFSET;
    4702           0 :         flags |= MOV_TFHD_DEFAULT_BASE_IS_MOOF;
    4703             :     }
    4704             :     /* CMAF requires all values to be explicit in tfhd atoms */
    4705           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_CMAF)
    4706           0 :         flags |= MOV_TFHD_STSD_ID;
    4707             : 
    4708             :     /* Don't set a default sample size, the silverlight player refuses
    4709             :      * to play files with that set. Don't set a default sample duration,
    4710             :      * WMP freaks out if it is set. Don't set a base data offset, PIFF
    4711             :      * file format says it MUST NOT be set. */
    4712           0 :     if (track->mode == MODE_ISM)
    4713           0 :         flags &= ~(MOV_TFHD_DEFAULT_SIZE | MOV_TFHD_DEFAULT_DURATION |

    4720             : 
    4721           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->track_id); /* track-id */

    4725           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, 1);

    4734             :     } else

    4736             :

    4753           0 : static int mov_write_trun_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4754             :                               MOVTrack *track, int moof_size,
    4755             :                               int first, int end)
    4756             : {
    4757           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    4758           0 :     uint32_t flags = MOV_TRUN_DATA_OFFSET;
    4759           0 :     int i;
    4760             : 
    4761           0 :     for (i = first; i < end; i++) {
    4762           0 :         if (get_cluster_duration(track, i) != track->default_duration)
    4763           0 :             flags |= MOV_TRUN_SAMPLE_DURATION;
    4764           0 :         if (track->cluster[i].size != track->default_size)
    4765           0 :             flags |= MOV_TRUN_SAMPLE_SIZE;
    4766           0 :         if (i > first && get_sample_flags(track, &track->cluster[i]) != track->default_sample_flags)
    4767           0 :             flags |= MOV_TRUN_SAMPLE_FLAGS;
    4768             :     }
    4769           0 :     if (!(flags & MOV_TRUN_SAMPLE_FLAGS) && track->entry > 0 &&

    4773           0 :         flags |= MOV_TRUN_SAMPLE_CTS;
    4774             :

    4829           0 : static int mov_write_tfrf_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4830             :                               MOVTrack *track, int entry)
    4831             : {
    4832           0 :     int n = track->nb_frag_info - 1 - entry, i;
    4833           0 :     int size = 8 + 16 + 4 + 1 + 16*n;
    4834           0 :     static const uint8_t uuid[] = {
    4835             :         0xd4, 0x80, 0x7e, 0xf2, 0xca, 0x39, 0x46, 0x95,
    4836             :         0x8e, 0x54, 0x26, 0xcb, 0x9e, 0x46, 0xa7, 0x9f
    4837             :     };
    4838             : 
    4839           0 :     if (entry < 0)
    4840             :         return 0;
    4841             : 
    4842           0 :     avio_seek(pb, track->frag_info[entry].tfrf_offset, SEEK_SET);
    4843           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, size);
    4844           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "uuid");
    4845           0 :     avio_write(pb, uuid, AV_UUID_LEN);
    4846           0 :     avio_w8(pb, 1);
    4847           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, 0);
    4848           0 :     avio_w8(pb, n);
    4849           0 :     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    4850           0 :         int index = entry + 1 + i;
    4851           0 :         avio_wb64(pb, track->frag_info[index].time);
    4852           0 :         avio_wb64(pb, track->frag_info[index].duration);
    4853             :     }
    4854           0 :     if (n < mov->ism_lookahead) {
    4855           0 :         int free_size = 16 * (mov->ism_lookahead - n);
    4856           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, free_size);
    4857           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "free");
    4858           0 :         ffio_fill(pb, 0, free_size - 8);
    4859             :     }
    4860             : 
    4861             :     return 0;
    4862             : }
    4863             : 
    4864           0 : static int mov_write_tfrf_tags(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4865             :                                MOVTrack *track)
    4866             : {
    4867           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb);
    4868           0 :     int i;
    4869           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->ism_lookahead; i++) {
    4870             :         /* Update the tfrf tag for the last ism_lookahead fragments,
    4871             :          * nb_frag_info - 1 is the next fragment to be written. */
    4872           0 :         mov_write_tfrf_tag(pb, mov, track, track->nb_frag_info - 2 - i);
    4873             :     }
    4874           0 :     avio_seek(pb, pos, SEEK_SET);
    4875           0 :     return 0;
    4876             : }
    4877             : 
    4878           0 : static int mov_add_tfra_entries(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov, int tracks,
    4879             :                                 int size)
    4880             : {
    4881           0 :     int i;
    4882           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4883           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    4884           0 :         MOVFragmentInfo *info;
    4885           0 :         if ((tracks >= 0 && i != tracks) || !track->entry)
    4886           0 :             continue;
    4887           0 :         track->nb_frag_info++;
    4888           0 :         if (track->nb_frag_info >= track->frag_info_capacity) {
    4889           0 :             unsigned new_capacity = track->nb_frag_info + MOV_FRAG_INFO_ALLOC_INCREMENT;
    4890           0 :             if (av_reallocp_array(&track->frag_info,
    4891             :                                   new_capacity,
    4892             :                                   sizeof(*track->frag_info)))
    4893             :                 return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
    4894           0 :             track->frag_info_capacity = new_capacity;
    4895             :         }
    4896           0 :         info = &track->frag_info[track->nb_frag_info - 1];
    4897           0 :         info->offset   = avio_tell(pb);
    4898           0 :         info->size     = size;
    4899             :         // Try to recreate the original pts for the first packet
    4900             :         // from the fields we have stored
    4901           0 :         info->time     = track->cluster[0].dts + track->cluster[0].cts;
    4902           0 :         info->duration = track->end_pts -
    4903             :                          (track->cluster[0].dts + track->cluster[0].cts);
    4904             :         // If the pts is less than zero, we will have trimmed
    4905             :         // away parts of the media track using an edit list,
    4906             :         // and the corresponding start presentation time is zero.
    4907           0 :         if (info->time < 0) {
    4908           0 :             info->duration += info->time;
    4909           0 :             info->time = 0;
    4910             :         }
    4911           0 :         info->tfrf_offset = 0;
    4912           0 :         mov_write_tfrf_tags(pb, mov, track);
    4913             :     }
    4914             :     return 0;
    4915             : }

    4917           0 : static void mov_prune_frag_info(MOVMuxContext *mov, int tracks, int max)
    4918             : {
    4919           0 :     int i;
    4920           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    4921           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    4922           0 :         if ((tracks >= 0 && i != tracks) || !track->entry)
    4923           0 :             continue;
    4924           0 :         if (track->nb_frag_info > max) {
    4925           0 :             memmove(track->frag_info, track->frag_info + (track->nb_frag_info - max), max * sizeof(*track->frag_info));
    4926           0 :             track->nb_frag_info = max;
    4927             :         }
    4928             :     }
    4929           0 : }

    4931           0 : static int mov_write_tfdt_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVTrack *track)

    4943           0 : static int mov_write_traf_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    4944             :                               MOVTrack *track, int64_t moof_offset,
