    5005           0 : static int mov_write_sidx_tag(AVIOContext *pb,
    5006             :                               MOVTrack *track, int ref_size, int total_sidx_size)
    5007             : {
    5008           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb), offset_pos, end_pos;
    5009           0 :     int64_t presentation_time, duration, offset;
    5010           0 :     unsigned starts_with_SAP;
    5011           0 :     int i, entries;
    5012             : 
    5013           0 :     if (track->entry) {
    5014           0 :         entries = 1;
    5015           0 :         presentation_time = track->cluster[0].dts + track->cluster[0].cts -
    5016           0 :                             track->start_dts - track->start_cts;
    5017           0 :         duration = track->end_pts -
    5018             :                    (track->cluster[0].dts + track->cluster[0].cts);
    5019           0 :         starts_with_SAP = track->cluster[0].flags & MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5020             : 
    5021             :         // pts<0 should be cut away using edts
    5022           0 :         if (presentation_time < 0) {
    5023           0 :             duration += presentation_time;
    5024           0 :             presentation_time = 0;
    5025             :         }
    5026             :     } else {
    5027           0 :         entries = track->nb_frag_info;
    5028           0 :         if (entries <= 0)
    5029             :             return 0;
    5030           0 :         presentation_time = track->frag_info[0].time;
    5031             :         /* presentation_time <= 0 is handled by mov_add_tfra_entries() */
    5032           0 :         if (presentation_time > 0)
    5033           0 :             presentation_time -= track->start_dts + track->start_cts;
    5034             :     }
    5035             : 
    5036           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0); /* size */
    5037           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "sidx");
    5038           0 :     avio_w8(pb, 1); /* version */
    5039           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, 0);
    5040           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->track_id); /* reference_ID */
    5041           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, track->timescale); /* timescale */
    5042           0 :     avio_wb64(pb, presentation_time); /* earliest_presentation_time */
    5043           0 :     offset_pos = avio_tell(pb);
    5044           0 :     avio_wb64(pb, 0); /* first_offset (offset to referenced moof) */
    5045           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, 0); /* reserved */
    5046             : 
    5047           0 :     avio_wb16(pb, entries); /* reference_count */
    5048           0 :     for (i = 0; i < entries; i++) {
    5049           0 :         if (!track->entry) {
    5050           0 :             if (i > 1 && track->frag_info[i].offset != track->frag_info[i - 1].offset + track->frag_info[i - 1].size) {
    5051           0 :                av_log(NULL, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Non-consecutive fragments, writing incorrect sidx\n");
    5052             :             }
    5053           0 :             duration = track->frag_info[i].duration;
    5054           0 :             ref_size = track->frag_info[i].size;
    5055           0 :             starts_with_SAP = 1;
    5056             :         }
    5057           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, (0 << 31) | (ref_size & 0x7fffffff)); /* reference_type (0 = media) | referenced_size */
    5058           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, duration); /* subsegment_duration */
    5059           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, (starts_with_SAP << 31) | (0 << 28) | 0); /* starts_with_SAP | SAP_type | SAP_delta_time */
    5060             :     }
    5061             : 
    5062           0 :     end_pos = avio_tell(pb);
    5063           0 :     offset = pos + total_sidx_size - end_pos;
    5064           0 :     avio_seek(pb, offset_pos, SEEK_SET);
    5065           0 :     avio_wb64(pb, offset);
    5066           0 :     avio_seek(pb, end_pos, SEEK_SET);
    5067           0 :     return update_size(pb, pos);
    5068             : }
    5069             : 
    5070           0 : static int mov_write_sidx_tags(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov,
    5071             :                                int tracks, int ref_size)
    5072             : {
    5073           0 :     int i, round, ret;
    5074           0 :     AVIOContext *avio_buf;
    5075           0 :     int total_size = 0;
    5076           0 :     for (round = 0; round < 2; round++) {
    5077             :         // First run one round to calculate the total size of all
    5078             :         // sidx atoms.
    5079             :         // This would be much simpler if we'd only write one sidx
    5080             :         // atom, for the first track in the moof.
    5081           0 :         if (round == 0) {
    5082           0 :             if ((ret = ffio_open_null_buf(&avio_buf)) < 0)
    5083           0 :                 return ret;
    5084             :         } else {
    5085           0 :             avio_buf = pb;
    5086             :         }
    5087           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    5088           0 :             MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    5089           0 :             if (tracks >= 0 && i != tracks)
    5090           0 :                 continue;
    5091             :             // When writing a sidx for the full file, entry is 0, but
    5092             :             // we want to include all tracks. ref_size is 0 in this case,
    5093             :             // since we read it from frag_info instead.
    5094           0 :             if (!track->entry && ref_size > 0)
    5095           0 :                 continue;
    5096           0 :             total_size -= mov_write_sidx_tag(avio_buf, track, ref_size,
    5097             :                                              total_size);
    5098             :         }
    5099           0 :         if (round == 0)
    5100           0 :             total_size = ffio_close_null_buf(avio_buf);
    5101             :     }
    5102             :     return 0;
    5103             : }

    5105           0 : static int mov_write_prft_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov, int tracks)
    5106             : {
    5107           0 :     int64_t pos = avio_tell(pb), pts_us, ntp_ts;
    5108           0 :     MOVTrack *first_track;
    5109           0 :     int flags = 24;
    5110             : 
    5111             :     /* PRFT should be associated with at most one track. So, choosing only the
    5112             :      * first track. */
    5113           0 :     if (tracks > 0)
    5114             :         return 0;
    5115           0 :     first_track = &(mov->tracks[0]);
    5116             : 
    5117           0 :     if (!first_track->entry) {
    5118           0 :         av_log(mov->fc, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Unable to write PRFT, no entries in the track\n");
    5119           0 :         return 0;
    5120             :     }
    5121             : 
    5122           0 :     if (first_track->cluster[0].pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
    5123           0 :         av_log(mov->fc, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Unable to write PRFT, first PTS is invalid\n");
    5124           0 :         return 0;
    5125             :     }
    5126             : 
    5127           0 :     if (mov->write_prft == MOV_PRFT_SRC_WALLCLOCK) {
    5128           0 :         if (first_track->cluster[0].prft.wallclock) {
    5129             :             /* Round the NTP time to whole milliseconds. */
    5130           0 :             ntp_ts = ff_get_formatted_ntp_time((first_track->cluster[0].prft.wallclock / 1000) * 1000 +

    5132           0 :             flags = first_track->cluster[0].prft.flags;
    5133             :         } else
    5134           0 :             ntp_ts = ff_get_formatted_ntp_time(ff_ntp_time());

    5136           0 :         pts_us = av_rescale_q(first_track->cluster[0].pts,
    5137           0 :                               first_track->st->time_base, AV_TIME_BASE_Q);
    5138           0 :         ntp_ts = ff_get_formatted_ntp_time(pts_us + NTP_OFFSET_US);
    5139             :     } else {
    5140           0 :         av_log(mov->fc, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Unsupported PRFT box configuration: %d\n",
    5141             :                mov->write_prft);
    5142           0 :         return 0;
    5143             :     }
    5144             : 
    5145           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, 0);                           // Size place holder
    5146           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "prft");                   // Type
    5147           0 :     avio_w8(pb, 1);                             // Version
    5148           0 :     avio_wb24(pb, flags);                       // Flags

    5207             :

    5211           0 : static int mov_write_mfra_tag(AVIOContext *pb, MOVMuxContext *mov)

    5220             : 
    5221           0 :     avio_wb32(mfra_pb, 0); /* size placeholder */
    5222           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(mfra_pb, "mfra");
    5223             :     /* An empty mfra atom is enough to indicate to the publishing point that
    5224             :      * the stream has ended. */
    5225           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_ISML)
    5226           0 :         goto done_mfra;

    5228           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {

    5260           0 : static void mov_write_ftyp_tag_internal(AVIOContext *pb, AVFormatContext *s,
    5261             :                                         int has_h264, int has_video, int write_minor)
    5262             : {
    5263           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5264           0 :     int minor = 0x200;
    5265             : 
    5266           0 :     if (mov->major_brand && strlen(mov->major_brand) >= 4)
    5267           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, mov->major_brand);
    5268           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_3GP) {
    5269           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, has_h264 ? "3gp6"  : "3gp4");
    5270           0 :         minor =     has_h264 ?   0x100 :   0x200;
    5271           0 :     } else if (mov->mode == MODE_AVIF) {
    5272           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, mov->is_animated_avif ? "avis" : "avif");
    5273           0 :         minor = 0;
    5274           0 :     } else if (mov->mode & MODE_3G2) {
    5275           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, has_h264 ? "3g2b"  : "3g2a");
    5276           0 :         minor =     has_h264 ? 0x20000 : 0x10000;
    5277           0 :     } else if (mov->mode == MODE_PSP)
    5278           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "MSNV");
    5279           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_MP4 && mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT &&
    5280             :                                       mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_NEGATIVE_CTS_OFFSETS)
    5281           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "iso6"); // Required when using signed CTS offsets in trun boxes
    5282           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_MP4 && mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_DEFAULT_BASE_MOOF)
    5283           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "iso5"); // Required when using default-base-is-moof
    5284           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_MP4 && mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_NEGATIVE_CTS_OFFSETS)
    5285           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "iso4");
    5286           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_MP4)
    5287           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "isom");
    5288           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_IPOD)
    5289           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, has_video ? "M4V ":"M4A ");
    5290           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_ISM)
    5291           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "isml");
    5292           0 :     else if (mov->mode == MODE_F4V)
    5293           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "f4v ");
    5294             :     else
    5295           0 :         ffio_wfourcc(pb, "qt  ");
    5296             : 
    5297           0 :     if (write_minor)
    5298           0 :         avio_wb32(pb, minor);
    5299           0 : }
    5300             : 
    5301           0 : static int mov_write_ftyp_tag(AVIOContext *pb, AVFormatContext *s)

    5503           0 : static int mov_parse_mpeg2_frame(AVPacket *pkt, uint32_t *flags)
    5504             : {
    5505           0 :     uint32_t c = -1;
    5506           0 :     int i, closed_gop = 0;
    5507             : 
    5508           0 :     for (i = 0; i < pkt->size - 4; i++) {
    5509           0 :         c = (c << 8) + pkt->data[i];
    5510           0 :         if (c == 0x1b8) { // gop
    5511           0 :             closed_gop = pkt->data[i + 4] >> 6 & 0x01;
    5512           0 :         } else if (c == 0x100) { // pic
    5513           0 :             int temp_ref = (pkt->data[i + 1] << 2) | (pkt->data[i + 2] >> 6);
    5514           0 :             if (!temp_ref || closed_gop) // I picture is not reordered
    5515           0 :                 *flags = MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5516             :             else
    5517           0 :                 *flags = MOV_PARTIAL_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5518             :             break;
    5519             :         }
    5520             :     }
    5521           0 :     return 0;
    5522             : }
    5523             : 
    5524           0 : static void mov_parse_vc1_frame(AVPacket *pkt, MOVTrack *trk)
    5525             : {
    5526           0 :     const uint8_t *start, *next, *end = pkt->data + pkt->size;
    5527           0 :     int seq = 0, entry = 0;
    5528           0 :     int key = pkt->flags & AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
    5529           0 :     start = find_next_marker(pkt->data, end);
    5530           0 :     for (next = start; next < end; start = next) {
    5531           0 :         next = find_next_marker(start + 4, end);
    5532           0 :         switch (AV_RB32(start)) {
    5533           0 :         case VC1_CODE_SEQHDR:
    5534           0 :             seq = 1;
    5535           0 :             break;
    5536           0 :         case VC1_CODE_ENTRYPOINT:
    5537           0 :             entry = 1;
    5538           0 :             break;
    5539           0 :         case VC1_CODE_SLICE:
    5540           0 :             trk->vc1_info.slices = 1;
    5541           0 :             break;
    5542             :         }
    5543             :     }
    5544           0 :     if (!trk->entry && trk->vc1_info.first_packet_seen)
    5545           0 :         trk->vc1_info.first_frag_written = 1;
    5546           0 :     if (!trk->entry && !trk->vc1_info.first_frag_written) {
    5547             :         /* First packet in first fragment */
    5548           0 :         trk->vc1_info.first_packet_seq   = seq;
    5549           0 :         trk->vc1_info.first_packet_entry = entry;
    5550           0 :         trk->vc1_info.first_packet_seen  = 1;
    5551           0 :     } else if ((seq && !trk->vc1_info.packet_seq) ||
    5552           0 :                (entry && !trk->vc1_info.packet_entry)) {
    5553             :         int i;
    5554           0 :         for (i = 0; i < trk->entry; i++)
    5555           0 :             trk->cluster[i].flags &= ~MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5556           0 :         trk->has_keyframes = 0;
    5557           0 :         if (seq)
    5558           0 :             trk->vc1_info.packet_seq = 1;
    5559           0 :         if (entry)
    5560           0 :             trk->vc1_info.packet_entry = 1;
    5561           0 :         if (!trk->vc1_info.first_frag_written) {
    5562             :             /* First fragment */
    5563           0 :             if ((!seq   || trk->vc1_info.first_packet_seq) &&
    5564           0 :                 (!entry || trk->vc1_info.first_packet_entry)) {
    5565             :                 /* First packet had the same headers as this one, readd the
    5566             :                  * sync sample flag. */
    5567           0 :                 trk->cluster[0].flags |= MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5568           0 :                 trk->has_keyframes = 1;
    5569             :             }
    5570             :         }
    5571             :     }
    5572           0 :     if (trk->vc1_info.packet_seq && trk->vc1_info.packet_entry)
    5573           0 :         key = seq && entry;
    5574           0 :     else if (trk->vc1_info.packet_seq)
    5575             :         key = seq;
    5576           0 :     else if (trk->vc1_info.packet_entry)
    5577           0 :         key = entry;
    5578           0 :     if (key) {
    5579           0 :         trk->cluster[trk->entry].flags |= MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5580           0 :         trk->has_keyframes++;
    5581             :     }
    5582           0 : }
    5583             : 
    5584           0 : static void mov_parse_truehd_frame(AVPacket *pkt, MOVTrack *trk)
    5585             : {
    5586           0 :     int length;
    5587             : 
    5588           0 :     if (pkt->size < 8)
    5589             :         return;

    5591           0 :     length = (AV_RB16(pkt->data) & 0xFFF) * 2;
    5592           0 :     if (length < 8 || length > pkt->size)
    5593             :         return;
    5594             : 
    5595           0 :     if (AV_RB32(pkt->data + 4) == 0xF8726FBA) {
    5596           0 :         trk->cluster[trk->entry].flags |= MOV_SYNC_SAMPLE;
    5597           0 :         trk->has_keyframes++;
    5598             :     }
    5599             : 
    5600             :     return;

    5602             : 
    5603           0 : static int mov_flush_fragment_interleaving(AVFormatContext *s, MOVTrack *track)
    5604             : {
    5605           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5606           0 :     int ret, buf_size;
    5607           0 :     uint8_t *buf;
    5608           0 :     int i, offset;
    5609             : 
    5610           0 :     if (!track->mdat_buf)
    5611             :         return 0;
    5612           0 :     if (!mov->mdat_buf) {
    5613           0 :         if ((ret = avio_open_dyn_buf(&mov->mdat_buf)) < 0)
    5614             :             return ret;
    5615             :     }
    5616           0 :     buf_size = avio_get_dyn_buf(track->mdat_buf, &buf);

    5621             :

    5624           0 :     track->entries_flushed = track->entry;

    5628           0 : static int mov_write_squashed_packet(AVFormatContext *s, MOVTrack *track)
    5629             : {
    5630           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5631           0 :     AVPacket *squashed_packet = mov->pkt;
    5632           0 :     int ret = AVERROR_BUG;
    5633             : 
    5634           0 :     switch (track->st->codecpar->codec_id) {
    5635           0 :     case AV_CODEC_ID_TTML: {
    5636           0 :         int had_packets = !!track->squashed_packet_queue.head;
    5637             : 
    5638           0 :         if ((ret = ff_mov_generate_squashed_ttml_packet(s, track, squashed_packet)) < 0) {
    5639           0 :             goto finish_squash;
    5640             :         }
    5641             : 
    5642             :         // We have generated a padding packet (no actual input packets in
    5643             :         // queue) and its duration is zero. Skipping writing it.
    5644           0 :         if (!had_packets && squashed_packet->duration == 0) {
    5645           0 :             goto finish_squash;
    5646             :         }
    5647             : 
    5648           0 :         track->end_reliable = 1;
    5649           0 :         break;
    5650             :     }
    5651           0 :     default:
    5652           0 :         ret = AVERROR(EINVAL);
    5653           0 :         goto finish_squash;
    5654             :     }
    5655             : 
    5656           0 :     squashed_packet->stream_index = track->st->index;
    5657             : 
    5658           0 :     ret = mov_write_single_packet(s, squashed_packet);
    5659             : 
    5660           0 : finish_squash:
    5661           0 :     av_packet_unref(squashed_packet);
    5662             : 
    5663           0 :     return ret;
    5664             : }
    5665             : 
    5666           0 : static int mov_write_squashed_packets(AVFormatContext *s)
    5667             : {
    5668           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5669             : 
    5670           0 :     for (int i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    5671           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    5672           0 :         int ret = AVERROR_BUG;
    5673             : 
    5674           0 :         if (track->squash_fragment_samples_to_one && !track->entry) {
    5675           0 :             if ((ret = mov_write_squashed_packet(s, track)) < 0) {
    5676           0 :                 av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,
    5677             :                        "Failed to write squashed packet for %s stream with "
    5678             :                        "index %d and track id %d. Error: %s\n",
    5679           0 :                        avcodec_get_name(track->st->codecpar->codec_id),
    5680           0 :                        track->st->index, track->track_id,
    5681           0 :                        av_err2str(ret));
    5682           0 :                 return ret;
    5683             :             }
    5684             :         }
    5685             :     }
    5686             : 
    5687             :     return 0;
    5688             : }
    5689             : 
    5690           0 : static int mov_flush_fragment(AVFormatContext *s, int force)
    5691             : {
    5692           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5693           0 :     int i, first_track = -1;
    5694           0 :     int64_t mdat_size = 0;
    5695           0 :     int ret;
    5696           0 :     int has_video = 0, starts_with_key = 0, first_video_track = 1;
    5697             : 
    5698           0 :     if (!(mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT))
    5699             :         return 0;
    5700             : 
    5701             :     // Check if we have any tracks that require squashing.
    5702             :     // In that case, we'll have to write the packet here.
    5703           0 :     if ((ret = mov_write_squashed_packets(s)) < 0)
    5704             :         return ret;
    5705             : 
    5706             :     // Try to fill in the duration of the last packet in each stream
    5707             :     // from queued packets in the interleave queues. If the flushing
    5708             :     // of fragments was triggered automatically by an AVPacket, we
    5709             :     // already have reliable info for the end of that track, but other
    5710             :     // tracks may need to be filled in.
    5711           0 :     for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    5712           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    5713           0 :         if (!track->end_reliable) {
    5714           0 :             const AVPacket *pkt = ff_interleaved_peek(s, i);
    5715           0 :             if (pkt) {
    5716           0 :                 int64_t offset, dts, pts;
    5717           0 :                 ff_get_muxer_ts_offset(s, i, &offset);
    5718           0 :                 pts = pkt->pts + offset;
    5719           0 :                 dts = pkt->dts + offset;
    5720           0 :                 if (track->dts_shift != AV_NOPTS_VALUE)
    5721           0 :                     dts += track->dts_shift;
    5722           0 :                 track->track_duration = dts - track->start_dts;
    5723           0 :                 if (pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE)
    5724           0 :                     track->end_pts = pts;
    5725             :                 else
    5726           0 :                     track->end_pts = dts;
    5727             :             }
    5728             :         }
    5729             :     }
    5730             : 
    5731           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    5732           0 :         MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];
    5733           0 :         if (track->entry <= 1)
    5734           0 :             continue;
    5735             :         // Sample durations are calculated as the diff of dts values,
    5736             :         // but for the last sample in a fragment, we don't know the dts
    5737             :         // of the first sample in the next fragment, so we have to rely
    5738             :         // on what was set as duration in the AVPacket. Not all callers
    5739             :         // set this though, so we might want to replace it with an
    5740             :         // estimate if it currently is zero.
    5741           0 :         if (get_cluster_duration(track, track->entry - 1) != 0)
    5742           0 :             continue;
    5743             :         // Use the duration (i.e. dts diff) of the second last sample for
    5744             :         // the last one. This is a wild guess (and fatal if it turns out
    5745             :         // to be too long), but probably the best we can do - having a zero
    5746             :         // duration is bad as well.
    5747           0 :         track->track_duration += get_cluster_duration(track, track->entry - 2);
    5748           0 :         track->end_pts        += get_cluster_duration(track, track->entry - 2);
    5749           0 :         if (!mov->missing_duration_warned) {
    5750           0 :             av_log(s, AV_LOG_WARNING,
    5751             :                    "Estimating the duration of the last packet in a "
    5752             :                    "fragment, consider setting the duration field in "
    5753             :                    "AVPacket instead.\n");
    5754           0 :             mov->missing_duration_warned = 1;
    5755             :         }
    5756             :     }
    5757             : 
    5758           0 :     if (!mov->moov_written) {

    5805             :     }
    5806             : 
    5807           0 :     if (mov->frag_interleave) {
    5808           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {

    5852           0 :         uint8_t *buf;
    5853             : 
    5854           0 :         if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_SEPARATE_MOOF) {

    5856           0 :                 continue;
    5857           0 :             mdat_size = avio_tell(track->mdat_buf);

    5898           0 : static int mov_auto_flush_fragment(AVFormatContext *s, int force)
    5899             : {
    5900           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5901           0 :     int had_moov = mov->moov_written;
    5902           0 :     int ret = mov_flush_fragment(s, force);
    5903           0 :     if (ret < 0)
    5904             :         return ret;
    5905             :     // If using delay_moov, the first flush only wrote the moov,
    5906             :     // not the actual moof+mdat pair, thus flush once again.
    5907           0 :     if (!had_moov && mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_DELAY_MOOV)
    5908           0 :         ret = mov_flush_fragment(s, force);
    5909             :     return ret;

    5911             : 
    5912           0 : static int check_pkt(AVFormatContext *s, AVPacket *pkt)
    5913             : {
    5914           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5915           0 :     MOVTrack *trk = &mov->tracks[pkt->stream_index];
    5916           0 :     int64_t ref;
    5917           0 :     uint64_t duration;
    5918             : 
    5919           0 :     if (trk->entry) {
    5920           0 :         ref = trk->cluster[trk->entry - 1].dts;
    5921           0 :     } else if (   trk->start_dts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE
    5922           0 :                && !trk->frag_discont) {
    5923           0 :         ref = trk->start_dts + trk->track_duration;
    5924             :     } else
    5925           0 :         ref = pkt->dts; // Skip tests for the first packet
    5926             : 
    5927           0 :     if (trk->dts_shift != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
    5928             :         /* With negative CTS offsets we have set an offset to the DTS,
    5929             :          * reverse this for the check. */
    5930           0 :         ref -= trk->dts_shift;
    5931             :     }
    5932             : 
    5933           0 :     duration = pkt->dts - ref;
    5934           0 :     if (pkt->dts < ref || duration >= INT_MAX) {
    5935           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Packet duration: %"PRId64" / dts: %"PRId64" is out of range\n",
    5936             :                duration, pkt->dts);
    5937             : 
    5938           0 :         pkt->dts = ref + 1;
    5939           0 :         pkt->pts = AV_NOPTS_VALUE;
    5940             :     }
    5941             : 
    5942           0 :     if (pkt->duration < 0 || pkt->duration > INT_MAX) {
    5943           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Application provided duration: %"PRId64" is invalid\n", pkt->duration);
    5944           0 :         return AVERROR(EINVAL);
    5945             :     }
    5946             :     return 0;
    5947             : }
    5948             : 
    5949           0 : int ff_mov_write_packet(AVFormatContext *s, AVPacket *pkt)
    5950             : {
    5951           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    5952           0 :     AVIOContext *pb = s->pb;
    5953           0 :     MOVTrack *trk = &mov->tracks[pkt->stream_index];
    5954           0 :     AVCodecParameters *par = trk->par;
    5955           0 :     AVProducerReferenceTime *prft;
    5956           0 :     unsigned int samples_in_chunk = 0;
    5957           0 :     int size = pkt->size, ret = 0, offset = 0;
    5958           0 :     size_t prft_size;
    5959           0 :     uint8_t *reformatted_data = NULL;
    5960             : 
    5961           0 :     ret = check_pkt(s, pkt);
    5962           0 :     if (ret < 0)
    5963             :         return ret;
    5964             : 
    5965           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT || mov->mode == MODE_AVIF) {
    5966           0 :         int ret;
    5967           0 :         if (mov->moov_written || mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_EMPTY_MOOV) {

    5969           0 :                 if (trk->entry - trk->entries_flushed >= mov->frag_interleave) {
    5970           0 :                     if ((ret = mov_flush_fragment_interleaving(s, trk)) < 0)
    5971             :                         return ret;
    5972             :                 }
    5973             :             }
    5974             : 
    5975           0 :             if (!trk->mdat_buf) {
    5976           0 :                 if ((ret = avio_open_dyn_buf(&trk->mdat_buf)) < 0)
    5977             :                     return ret;
    5978             :             }
    5979           0 :             pb = trk->mdat_buf;
    5980             :         } else {
    5981           0 :             if (!mov->mdat_buf) {
    5982           0 :                 if ((ret = avio_open_dyn_buf(&mov->mdat_buf)) < 0)
    5983             :                     return ret;
    5984             :             }
    5985           0 :             pb = mov->mdat_buf;
    5986             :         }
    5987             :     }
    5988             : 
    5989           0 :     if (par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_AMR_NB) {
    5990             :         /* We must find out how many AMR blocks there are in one packet */

    5992             :             {13, 14, 16, 18, 20, 21, 27, 32, 6, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1};

    6005           0 :         samples_in_chunk = trk->par->frame_size;

    6015             :

    6173           0 :         !trk->entry && trk->start_dts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
    6174           0 :         if (!trk->frag_discont) {
    6175             :             /* First packet of a new fragment. We already wrote the duration
    6176             :              * of the last packet of the previous fragment based on track_duration,
    6177             :              * which might not exactly match our dts. Therefore adjust the dts
    6178             :              * of this packet to be what the previous packets duration implies. */

    6293           0 : static int mov_write_single_packet(AVFormatContext *s, AVPacket *pkt)

    6298           0 :     int64_t frag_duration = 0;

    6300             : 
    6301           0 :     int ret = check_pkt(s, pkt);
    6302           0 :     if (ret < 0)
    6303             :         return ret;
    6304             : 
    6305           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAG_DISCONT) {
    6306             :         int i;
    6307           0 :         for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++)
    6308           0 :             mov->tracks[i].frag_discont = 1;
    6309           0 :         mov->flags &= ~FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAG_DISCONT;
    6310             :     }

    6360           0 :         if (frag_duration >= mov->min_fragment_duration) {
    6361           0 :             if (trk->entry) {

    6363             :                 // sample in this track. This avoids relying on AVPacket
    6364             :                 // duration, but only helps for this particular track, not
    6365             :                 // for the other ones that are flushed at the same time.

    6403             : 
    6404           0 : static int mov_write_packet(AVFormatContext *s, AVPacket *pkt)
    6405             : {
    6406           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    6407           0 :     MOVTrack *trk;
    6408             : 
    6409           0 :     if (!pkt) {
    6410           0 :         mov_flush_fragment(s, 1);
    6411           0 :         return 1;
    6412             :     }
    6413             : 
    6414           0 :     trk = &mov->tracks[pkt->stream_index];
    6415             : 
    6416           0 :     if (is_cover_image(trk->st)) {
    6417           0 :         int ret;
    6418             : 
    6419           0 :         if (trk->st->nb_frames >= 1) {
    6420           0 :             if (trk->st->nb_frames == 1)
    6421           0 :                 av_log(s, AV_LOG_WARNING, "Got more than one picture in stream %d,"
    6422             :                        " ignoring.\n", pkt->stream_index);
    6423           0 :             return 0;
    6424             :         }
    6425             : 
    6426           0 :         if ((ret = av_packet_ref(trk->cover_image, pkt)) < 0)
    6427             :             return ret;
    6428             : 
    6429           0 :         return 0;
    6430             :     } else {
    6431           0 :         int i;
    6432             : 
    6433           0 :         if (!pkt->size)
    6434           0 :             return mov_write_single_packet(s, pkt); /* Passthrough. */
    6435             : 
    6436             :         /*
    6437             :          * Subtitles require special handling.
    6438             :          *
    6439             :          * 1) For full complaince, every track must have a sample at
    6440             :          * dts == 0, which is rarely true for subtitles. So, as soon
    6441             :          * as we see any packet with dts > 0, write an empty subtitle
    6442             :          * at dts == 0 for any subtitle track with no samples in it.
    6443             :          *
    6444             :          * 2) For each subtitle track, check if the current packet's
    6445             :          * dts is past the duration of the last subtitle sample. If
    6446             :          * so, we now need to write an end sample for that subtitle.
    6447             :          *
    6448             :          * This must be done conditionally to allow for subtitles that
    6449             :          * immediately replace each other, in which case an end sample
    6450             :          * is not needed, and is, in fact, actively harmful.
    6451             :          *
    6452             :          * 3) See mov_write_trailer for how the final end sample is
    6453             :          * handled.
    6454             :          */
    6455           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++) {
    6456           0 :             MOVTrack *trk = &mov->tracks[i];
    6457           0 :             int ret;
    6458             : 
    6459           0 :             if (trk->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_MOV_TEXT &&
    6460           0 :                 trk->track_duration < pkt->dts &&
    6461           0 :                 (trk->entry == 0 || !trk->last_sample_is_subtitle_end)) {
    6462           0 :                 ret = mov_write_subtitle_end_packet(s, i, trk->track_duration);
    6463           0 :                 if (ret < 0) return ret;
    6464           0 :                 trk->last_sample_is_subtitle_end = 1;
    6465             :             }
    6466             :         }
    6467             : 
    6468           0 :         if (trk->squash_fragment_samples_to_one) {
    6469             :             /*
    6470             :              * If the track has to have its samples squashed into one sample,
    6471             :              * we just take it into the track's queue.
    6472             :              * This will then be utilized as the samples get written in either
    6473             :              * mov_flush_fragment or when the mux is finalized in
    6474             :              * mov_write_trailer.
    6475             :              */
    6476           0 :             int ret = AVERROR_BUG;
    6477             : 
    6478           0 :             if (pkt->pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
    6479           0 :                 av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR,
    6480             :                        "Packets without a valid presentation timestamp are "
    6481             :                        "not supported with packet squashing!\n");
    6482           0 :                 return AVERROR(EINVAL);
    6483             :             }
    6484             : 
    6485             :             /* The following will reset pkt and is only allowed to be used
    6486             :              * because we return immediately. afterwards. */
    6487           0 :             if ((ret = avpriv_packet_list_put(&trk->squashed_packet_queue,
    6488             :                                               pkt, NULL, 0)) < 0) {
    6489             :                 return ret;
    6490             :             }
    6491             : 
    6492           0 :             return 0;
    6493             :         }
    6494             : 
    6495             : 
    6496           0 :         if (trk->mode == MODE_MOV && trk->par->codec_type == AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO) {
    6497           0 :             AVPacket *opkt = pkt;
    6498           0 :             int reshuffle_ret, ret;
    6499           0 :             if (trk->is_unaligned_qt_rgb) {
    6500           0 :                 int64_t bpc = trk->par->bits_per_coded_sample != 15 ? trk->par->bits_per_coded_sample : 16;
    6501           0 :                 int expected_stride = ((trk->par->width * bpc + 15) >> 4)*2;
    6502           0 :                 reshuffle_ret = ff_reshuffle_raw_rgb(s, &pkt, trk->par, expected_stride);
    6503           0 :                 if (reshuffle_ret < 0)
    6504             :                     return reshuffle_ret;
    6505             :             } else
    6506             :                 reshuffle_ret = 0;
    6507           0 :             if (trk->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_PAL8 && !trk->pal_done) {
    6508           0 :                 ret = ff_get_packet_palette(s, opkt, reshuffle_ret, trk->palette);
    6509           0 :                 if (ret < 0)
    6510           0 :                     goto fail;
    6511           0 :                 if (ret)
    6512           0 :                     trk->pal_done++;
    6513           0 :             } else if (trk->par->codec_id == AV_CODEC_ID_RAWVIDEO &&
    6514           0 :                        (trk->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_GRAY8 ||
    6515             :                        trk->par->format == AV_PIX_FMT_MONOBLACK)) {
    6516           0 :                 ret = av_packet_make_writable(pkt);
    6517           0 :                 if (ret < 0)
    6518           0 :                     goto fail;
    6519           0 :                 for (i = 0; i < pkt->size; i++)
    6520           0 :                     pkt->data[i] = ~pkt->data[i];
    6521             :             }
    6522           0 :             if (reshuffle_ret) {
    6523           0 :                 ret = mov_write_single_packet(s, pkt);
    6524           0 : fail:
    6525           0 :                 if (reshuffle_ret)
    6526           0 :                     av_packet_free(&pkt);
    6527           0 :                 return ret;
    6528             :             }
    6529             :         }
    6530             : 
    6531           0 :         return mov_write_single_packet(s, pkt);
    6532             :     }
    6533             : }
    6534             : 
    6535             : // QuickTime chapters involve an additional text track with the chapter names
    6536             : // as samples, and a tref pointing from the other tracks to the chapter one.
    6537           0 : static int mov_create_chapter_track(AVFormatContext *s, int tracknum)
    6538             : {
    6539           0 :     static const uint8_t stub_header[] = {
    6540             :         // TextSampleEntry
    6541             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, // displayFlags
    6542             :         0x00, 0x00,             // horizontal + vertical justification
    6543             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // bgColourRed/Green/Blue/Alpha
    6544             :         // BoxRecord
    6545             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // defTextBoxTop/Left
    6546             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // defTextBoxBottom/Right
    6547             :         // StyleRecord
    6548             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // startChar + endChar
    6549             :         0x00, 0x01,             // fontID
    6550             :         0x00, 0x00,             // fontStyleFlags + fontSize
    6551             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, // fgColourRed/Green/Blue/Alpha
    6552             :         // FontTableBox
    6553             :         0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x0D, // box size
    6554             :         'f', 't', 'a', 'b',     // box atom name
    6555             :         0x00, 0x01,             // entry count
    6556             :         // FontRecord
    6557             :         0x00, 0x01,             // font ID
    6558             :         0x00,                   // font name length
    6559             :     };
    6560           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;

    6564           0 :     int ret;
    6565             : 
    6566           0 :     track->mode = mov->mode;

    6624           0 : static int mov_create_timecode_track(AVFormatContext *s, int index, int src_index, AVTimecode tc)
    6625             : {
    6626           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov  = s->priv_data;
    6627           0 :     MOVTrack *track     = &mov->tracks[index];
    6628           0 :     AVStream *src_st    = s->streams[src_index];
    6629           0 :     uint8_t data[4];
    6630           0 :     AVPacket *pkt = mov->pkt;
    6631           0 :     AVRational rate = src_st->avg_frame_rate;
    6632           0 :     int ret;
    6633             : 
    6634             :     /* tmcd track based on video stream */
    6635           0 :     track->mode      = mov->mode;
    6636           0 :     track->tag       = MKTAG('t','m','c','d');
    6637           0 :     track->src_track = src_index;
    6638           0 :     track->timescale = mov->tracks[src_index].timescale;
    6639           0 :     if (tc.flags & AV_TIMECODE_FLAG_DROPFRAME)
    6640           0 :         track->timecode_flags |= MOV_TIMECODE_FLAG_DROPFRAME;
    6641             : 
    6642             :     /* set st to src_st for metadata access*/
    6643           0 :     track->st = src_st;
    6644             : 
    6645             :     /* encode context: tmcd data stream */
    6646           0 :     track->par = avcodec_parameters_alloc();
    6647           0 :     if (!track->par)
    6648             :         return AVERROR(ENOMEM);
    6649           0 :     track->par->codec_type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_DATA;
    6650           0 :     track->par->codec_tag  = track->tag;
    6651           0 :     track->st->avg_frame_rate = rate;
    6652             : 
    6653             :     /* the tmcd track just contains one packet with the frame number */
    6654           0 :     pkt->data = data;
    6655           0 :     pkt->stream_index = index;
    6656           0 :     pkt->flags = AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
    6657           0 :     pkt->pts = pkt->dts = av_rescale_q(tc.start, av_inv_q(rate), (AVRational){1,mov->movie_timescale});
    6658           0 :     pkt->size = 4;
    6659           0 :     AV_WB32(pkt->data, tc.start);
    6660           0 :     ret = ff_mov_write_packet(s, pkt);
    6661           0 :     av_packet_unref(pkt);
    6662           0 :     return ret;
    6663             : }
    6664             : 
    6665             : /*
    6666             :  * st->disposition controls the "enabled" flag in the tkhd tag.
    6667             :  * QuickTime will not play a track if it is not enabled.  So make sure
    6668             :  * that one track of each type (audio, video, subtitle) is enabled.
    6669             :  *
    6670             :  * Subtitles are special.  For audio and video, setting "enabled" also
    6671             :  * makes the track "default" (i.e. it is rendered when played). For
    6672             :  * subtitles, an "enabled" subtitle is not rendered by default, but
    6673             :  * if no subtitle is enabled, the subtitle menu in QuickTime will be
    6674             :  * empty!
    6675             :  */
    6676           0 : static void enable_tracks(AVFormatContext *s)
    6677             : {
    6678           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    6679           0 :     int i;
    6680           0 :     int enabled[AVMEDIA_TYPE_NB];
    6681           0 :     int first[AVMEDIA_TYPE_NB];
    6682             : 
    6683           0 :     for (i = 0; i < AVMEDIA_TYPE_NB; i++) {
    6684           0 :         enabled[i] = 0;
    6685           0 :         first[i] = -1;
    6686             :     }
    6687             : 
    6688           0 :     for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    6689           0 :         AVStream *st = s->streams[i];
    6690             : 
    6691           0 :         if (st->codecpar->codec_type <= AVMEDIA_TYPE_UNKNOWN ||
    6692             :             st->codecpar->codec_type >= AVMEDIA_TYPE_NB ||
    6693           0 :             is_cover_image(st))
    6694           0 :             continue;
    6695             : 
    6696           0 :         if (first[st->codecpar->codec_type] < 0)
    6697           0 :             first[st->codecpar->codec_type] = i;
    6698           0 :         if (st->disposition & AV_DISPOSITION_DEFAULT) {
    6699           0 :             mov->tracks[i].flags |= MOV_TRACK_ENABLED;
    6700           0 :             enabled[st->codecpar->codec_type]++;
    6701             :         }
    6702             :     }
    6703             : 
    6704           0 :     for (i = 0; i < AVMEDIA_TYPE_NB; i++) {
    6705           0 :         switch (i) {
    6706           0 :         case AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO:
    6707             :         case AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO:
    6708             :         case AVMEDIA_TYPE_SUBTITLE:
    6709           0 :             if (enabled[i] > 1)
    6710           0 :                 mov->per_stream_grouping = 1;
    6711           0 :             if (!enabled[i] && first[i] >= 0)
    6712           0 :                 mov->tracks[first[i]].flags |= MOV_TRACK_ENABLED;
    6713             :             break;
    6714             :         }
    6715             :     }
    6716           0 : }

    6758             : 
    6759           0 : static uint32_t rgb_to_yuv(uint32_t rgb)
    6760             : {
    6761           0 :     uint8_t r, g, b;
    6762           0 :     int y, cb, cr;
    6763             : 
    6764           0 :     r = (rgb >> 16) & 0xFF;
    6765           0 :     g = (rgb >>  8) & 0xFF;
    6766           0 :     b = (rgb      ) & 0xFF;
    6767             : 
    6768           0 :     y  = av_clip_uint8(( 16000 +  257 * r + 504 * g +  98 * b)/1000);
    6769           0 :     cb = av_clip_uint8((128000 -  148 * r - 291 * g + 439 * b)/1000);
    6770           0 :     cr = av_clip_uint8((128000 +  439 * r - 368 * g -  71 * b)/1000);
    6771             : 
    6772           0 :     return (y << 16) | (cr << 8) | cb;
    6773             : }
    6774             : 
    6775           0 : static int mov_create_dvd_sub_decoder_specific_info(MOVTrack *track,
    6776             :                                                     AVStream *st)
    6777             : {
    6778           0 :     int i, width = 720, height = 480;
    6779           0 :     int have_palette = 0, have_size = 0;

    6822           0 :     return 0;

    6825           0 : static int mov_init(AVFormatContext *s)
    6826             : {
    6827           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    6828           0 :     int i, ret;
    6829             : 
    6830           0 :     mov->fc = s;
    6831           0 :     mov->pkt = ffformatcontext(s)->pkt;
    6832             : 
    6833             :     /* Default mode == MP4 */
    6834           0 :     mov->mode = MODE_MP4;
    6835             : 
    6836             : #define IS_MODE(muxer, config) (CONFIG_ ## config ## _MUXER && !strcmp(#muxer, s->oformat->name))
    6837           0 :     if      (IS_MODE(3gp,   TGP)) mov->mode = MODE_3GP;
    6838           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(3g2,   TG2)) mov->mode = MODE_3GP|MODE_3G2;
    6839           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(mov,   MOV)) mov->mode = MODE_MOV;
    6840           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(psp,   PSP)) mov->mode = MODE_PSP;
    6841           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(ipod, IPOD)) mov->mode = MODE_IPOD;
    6842           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(ismv, ISMV)) mov->mode = MODE_ISM;
    6843           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(f4v,   F4V)) mov->mode = MODE_F4V;
    6844           0 :     else if (IS_MODE(avif, AVIF)) mov->mode = MODE_AVIF;
    6845             : #undef IS_MODE
    6846             : 
    6847           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_DELAY_MOOV)
    6848           0 :         mov->flags |= FF_MOV_FLAG_EMPTY_MOOV;
    6849             : 
    6850           0 :     if (mov->mode == MODE_AVIF)
    6851           0 :         mov->flags |= FF_MOV_FLAG_DELAY_MOOV;

    6854             :      * enabled. */

    6935           0 :         av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR, "muxer does not support non seekable output\n");
    6936           0 :         return AVERROR(EINVAL);
    6937             :     }
    6938             : 
    6939             :     /* AVIF output must have at most two video streams (one for YUV and one for
    6940             :      * alpha). */

    6942           0 :         if (s->nb_streams > 2) {
    6943           0 :             av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR, "AVIF output requires exactly one or two streams\n");
    6944           0 :             return AVERROR(EINVAL);
    6945             :         }
    6946           0 :         if (s->streams[0]->codecpar->codec_type != AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO &&

    6949           0 :             return AVERROR(EINVAL);
    6950             :         }

    6959           0 :         s->streams[0]->disposition |= AV_DISPOSITION_DEFAULT;

    7235           0 : static int mov_write_header(AVFormatContext *s)
    7236             : {
    7237           0 :     AVIOContext *pb = s->pb;
    7238           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7239           0 :     int i, ret, hint_track = 0, tmcd_track = 0, nb_tracks = s->nb_streams;

    7242           0 :         nb_tracks++;
    7243             : 
    7244           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_RTP_HINT) {
    7245           0 :         hint_track = nb_tracks;
    7246           0 :         for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++)
    7247           0 :             if (rtp_hinting_needed(s->streams[i]))
    7248           0 :                 nb_tracks++;
    7249             :     }
    7250             : 
    7251           0 :     if (mov->nb_meta_tmcd)
    7252           0 :         tmcd_track = nb_tracks;
    7253             : 
    7254           0 :     for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {

    7258             :

    7353           0 :         const AVDictionaryEntry *t, *global_tcr = av_dict_get(s->metadata,
    7354             :                                                               "timecode", NULL, 0);

    7392           0 : static int get_moov_size(AVFormatContext *s)
    7393             : {
    7394           0 :     int ret;
    7395           0 :     AVIOContext *moov_buf;

    7397             :

    7404             : 
    7405           0 : static int get_sidx_size(AVFormatContext *s)
    7406             : {
    7407           0 :     int ret;
    7408           0 :     AVIOContext *buf;
    7409           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7410             : 
    7411           0 :     if ((ret = ffio_open_null_buf(&buf)) < 0)
    7412             :         return ret;
    7413           0 :     mov_write_sidx_tags(buf, mov, -1, 0);
    7414           0 :     return ffio_close_null_buf(buf);
    7415             : }
    7416             : 
    7417             : /*
    7418             :  * This function gets the moov size if moved to the top of the file: the chunk
    7419             :  * offset table can switch between stco (32-bit entries) to co64 (64-bit
    7420             :  * entries) when the moov is moved to the beginning, so the size of the moov
    7421             :  * would change. It also updates the chunk offset tables.
    7422             :  */
    7423           0 : static int compute_moov_size(AVFormatContext *s)
    7424             : {
    7425           0 :     int i, moov_size, moov_size2;
    7426           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7427             : 
    7428           0 :     moov_size = get_moov_size(s);
    7429           0 :     if (moov_size < 0)
    7430             :         return moov_size;
    7431             : 
    7432           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++)
    7433           0 :         mov->tracks[i].data_offset += moov_size;
    7434             : 
    7435           0 :     moov_size2 = get_moov_size(s);
    7436           0 :     if (moov_size2 < 0)
    7437             :         return moov_size2;
    7438             : 
    7439             :     /* if the size changed, we just switched from stco to co64 and need to
    7440             :      * update the offsets */
    7441           0 :     if (moov_size2 != moov_size)
    7442           0 :         for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++)
    7443           0 :             mov->tracks[i].data_offset += moov_size2 - moov_size;
    7444             : 
    7445             :     return moov_size2;
    7446             : }
    7447             : 
    7448           0 : static int compute_sidx_size(AVFormatContext *s)
    7449             : {
    7450           0 :     int i, sidx_size;
    7451           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7452             : 
    7453           0 :     sidx_size = get_sidx_size(s);
    7454           0 :     if (sidx_size < 0)
    7455             :         return sidx_size;
    7456             : 
    7457           0 :     for (i = 0; i < mov->nb_streams; i++)
    7458           0 :         mov->tracks[i].data_offset += sidx_size;
    7459             : 
    7460             :     return sidx_size;
    7461             : }
    7462             : 
    7463           0 : static int shift_data(AVFormatContext *s)
    7464             : {
    7465           0 :     int moov_size;
    7466           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7467             : 
    7468           0 :     if (mov->flags & FF_MOV_FLAG_FRAGMENT)
    7469           0 :         moov_size = compute_sidx_size(s);
    7470             :     else
    7471           0 :         moov_size = compute_moov_size(s);
    7472           0 :     if (moov_size < 0)
    7473             :         return moov_size;
    7474             : 
    7475           0 :     return ff_format_shift_data(s, mov->reserved_header_pos, moov_size);
    7476             : }
    7477             : 
    7478           0 : static int mov_write_trailer(AVFormatContext *s)
    7479             : {
    7480           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;

    7487           0 :         for (i = 0; i < s->nb_streams; i++) {
    7488           0 :             MOVTrack *track = &mov->tracks[i];

    7498             :         }
    7499           0 :         mov->need_rewrite_extradata = 0;
    7500             :     }
    7501             : 
    7502             :     /*
    7503             :      * Before actually writing the trailer, make sure that there are no
    7504             :      * dangling subtitles, that need a terminating sample.

    7601           0 : static int mov_check_bitstream(AVFormatContext *s, AVStream *st,

    7616           0 : static int avif_write_trailer(AVFormatContext *s)
    7617             : {
    7618           0 :     AVIOContext *pb = s->pb;
    7619           0 :     MOVMuxContext *mov = s->priv_data;
    7620           0 :     int64_t pos_backup, extent_offsets[2];
    7621           0 :     uint8_t *buf;
    7622           0 :     int buf_size, moov_size, i;
    7623             : 
    7624           0 :     if (mov->moov_written) return 0;
    7625             : 
    7626           0 :     mov->is_animated_avif = s->streams[0]->nb_frames > 1;
    7627           0 :     if (mov->is_animated_avif && s->nb_streams > 1) {
    7628             :         // For animated avif with alpha channel, we need to write a tref tag
    7629             :         // with type "auxl".
    7630           0 :         mov->tracks[1].tref_tag = MKTAG('a', 'u', 'x', 'l');
    7631           0 :         mov->tracks[1].tref_id = 1;
    7632             :     }

    7634           0 :     mov_write_meta_tag(pb, mov, s);

    7639             :

    7641           0 :         int ret;
    7642           0 :         if ((ret = mov_write_moov_tag(pb, mov, s)) < 0)
    7643             :             return ret;
    7644             :     }
    7645             : 
    7646           0 :     buf_size = avio_get_dyn_buf(mov->mdat_buf, &buf);
    7647           0 :     avio_wb32(pb, buf_size + 8);
    7648           0 :     ffio_wfourcc(pb, "mdat");
    7649             : 
    7650             :     // The offset for the YUV planes is the starting position of mdat.
    7651           0 :     extent_offsets[0] = avio_tell(pb);

    7653           0 :     extent_offsets[1] = extent_offsets[0] + mov->avif_extent_length[0];

    7661           0 :             av_log(s, AV_LOG_ERROR, "extent offset does not fit in 32 bits\n");
    7662           0 :             return AVERROR_INVALIDDATA;
    7663             :         }

    7666             :     }
    7667           0 :     avio_seek(pb, pos_backup, SEEK_SET);
    7668             : 
    7669           0 :     return 0;

    7751             :     { AV_CODEC_ID_NONE, 0 },
    7752             : };
